66 // mute player for some times
67 bool ChatHandler::HandleMuteCommand(char* args)
68 {
69  char* nameStr = ExtractOptNotLastArg(&args);
70 
71  Player* target;
72  ObjectGuid target_guid;
73  std::string target_name;
74  if (!ExtractPlayerTarget(&nameStr, &target, &target_guid, &target_name))
75  return false;
76 
77  uint32 mutedMinutes;
78  if (!ExtractUInt32(&args, mutedMinutes))
79  return false;
80 
81  std::string givenReason;
82  if (char* givenReasonC = ExtractQuotedOrLiteralArg(&args))
83  givenReason = givenReasonC;
84 
85  uint32 account_id = target ? target->GetSession()->GetAccountId() : sObjectMgr.GetPlayerAccountIdByGUID(target_guid);
86 
87  // find only player from same account if any
88  if (!target)
89  {
90  if (WorldSession* session = sWorld.FindSession(account_id))
91  target = session->GetPlayer();
92  }
93 
94  // must have strong lesser security level
95  if (HasLowerSecurity(target, target_guid, true))
96  return false;
97 
98  time_t mutetime = time(nullptr) + mutedMinutes * 60;
99 
100  if (target)
101  target->GetSession()->m_muteTime = mutetime;
102 
103  LoginDatabase.PExecute("UPDATE account SET mutetime = " UI64FMTD " WHERE id = '%u'", uint64(mutetime), account_id);
104 
105  if (target)
106  ChatHandler(target).PSendSysMessage(LANG_YOUR_CHAT_DISABLED, mutedMinutes);
107 
108  std::string nameLink = playerLink(target_name);
109 
110  PSendSysMessage(LANG_YOU_DISABLE_CHAT, nameLink.c_str(), mutedMinutes);
111 
112  // Add warning to the account
113  std::string authorName = m_session ? m_session->GetPlayerName() : "Console";
114  std::stringstream reason;
115  reason << (target ? target->GetName() : target_name) << " muted " << mutedMinutes << " minutes";
116 
117  if (!givenReason.empty())
118  reason << " for \"" << givenReason << "\"";
119 
120  sWorld.WarnAccount(account_id, authorName, reason.str(), "WARNING");
121 
122  return true;
123 }

125 // unmute player
126 bool ChatHandler::HandleUnmuteCommand(char* args)
127 {
128  Player* target;
129  ObjectGuid target_guid;
130  std::string target_name;
131  if (!ExtractPlayerTarget(&args, &target, &target_guid, &target_name))
132  return false;
133 
134  uint32 account_id = target ? target->GetSession()->GetAccountId() : sObjectMgr.GetPlayerAccountIdByGUID(target_guid);
135 
136  // find only player from same account if any
137  if (!target)
138  {
139  if (WorldSession* session = sWorld.FindSession(account_id))
140  target = session->GetPlayer();
141  }
142 
143  // must have strong lesser security level
144  if (HasLowerSecurity(target, target_guid, true))
145  return false;
146 
147  if (target)
148  {
149  if (target->CanSpeak())
150  {
151  SendSysMessage(LANG_CHAT_ALREADY_ENABLED);
152  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
153  return false;
154  }
155 
156  target->GetSession()->m_muteTime = 0;
157  }
158 
159  LoginDatabase.PExecute("UPDATE account SET mutetime = '0' WHERE id = '%u'", account_id);
160 
161  if (target)
162  ChatHandler(target).PSendSysMessage(LANG_YOUR_CHAT_ENABLED);
163 
164  std::string nameLink = playerLink(target_name);
165 
166  PSendSysMessage(LANG_YOU_ENABLE_CHAT, nameLink.c_str());
167  return true;
168 }

170 void ChatHandler::ShowTriggerTargetListHelper(uint32 id, AreaTrigger const* at, bool subpart /*= false*/)
171 {
172  if (m_session)
173  {
174  char dist_buf[50];
175  if (!subpart)
176  {
177  float dist = m_session->GetPlayer()->GetDistance2d(at->target_X, at->target_Y);
178  snprintf(dist_buf, 50, GetMangosString(LANG_TRIGGER_DIST), dist);
179  }
180  else
181  dist_buf[0] = '\0';
182 
183  PSendSysMessage(LANG_TRIGGER_TARGET_LIST_CHAT,
184  subpart ? " -> " : "", id, id, at->target_mapId, at->target_X, at->target_Y, at->target_Z, dist_buf);
185  }
186  else
187  PSendSysMessage(LANG_TRIGGER_TARGET_LIST_CONSOLE,
188  subpart ? " -> " : "", id, at->target_mapId, at->target_X, at->target_Y, at->target_Z);
189 }

191 void ChatHandler::ShowTriggerListHelper(AreaTriggerEntry const* atEntry)
192 {
193  char const* tavern = sObjectMgr.IsTavernAreaTrigger(atEntry->id) ? GetMangosString(LANG_TRIGGER_TAVERN) : "";
194  char const* quest = sObjectMgr.GetQuestForAreaTrigger(atEntry->id) ? GetMangosString(LANG_TRIGGER_QUEST) : "";
195 
196  if (m_session)
197  {
198  float dist = m_session->GetPlayer()->GetDistance2d(atEntry->x, atEntry->y);
199  char dist_buf[50];
200  snprintf(dist_buf, 50, GetMangosString(LANG_TRIGGER_DIST), dist);
201 
202  PSendSysMessage(LANG_TRIGGER_LIST_CHAT,
203  atEntry->id, atEntry->id, atEntry->mapid, atEntry->x, atEntry->y, atEntry->z, dist_buf, tavern, quest);
204  }
205  else
206  PSendSysMessage(LANG_TRIGGER_LIST_CONSOLE,
207  atEntry->id, atEntry->mapid, atEntry->x, atEntry->y, atEntry->z, tavern, quest);
208 
209  if (AreaTrigger const* at = sObjectMgr.GetAreaTrigger(atEntry->id))
210  ShowTriggerTargetListHelper(atEntry->id, at, true);
211 }

213 bool ChatHandler::HandleTriggerCommand(char* args)
214 {
215  AreaTriggerEntry const* atEntry = nullptr;
216 
217  Player* pl = m_session ? m_session->GetPlayer() : nullptr;
218 
219  // select by args
220  if (*args)
221  {
222  uint32 atId;
223  if (!ExtractUint32KeyFromLink(&args, "Hareatrigger", atId))
224  return false;
225 
226  if (!atId)
227  return false;
228 
229  atEntry = sAreaTriggerStore.LookupEntry(atId);
230 
231  if (!atEntry)
232  {
233  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_GOAREATRNOTFOUND, atId);
234  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
235  return false;
236  }
237  }
238  // find nearest
239  else
240  {
241  if (!m_session)
242  return false;
243 
244  float dist2 = MAP_SIZE * MAP_SIZE;
245 
246  // Search triggers
247  for (uint32 id = 0; id < sAreaTriggerStore.GetNumRows(); ++id)
248  {
249  AreaTriggerEntry const* atTestEntry = sAreaTriggerStore.LookupEntry(id);
250  if (!atTestEntry)
251  continue;
252 
253  if (atTestEntry->mapid != m_session->GetPlayer()->GetMapId())
254  continue;
255 
256  float dx = atTestEntry->x - pl->GetPositionX();
257  float dy = atTestEntry->y - pl->GetPositionY();
258 
259  float test_dist2 = dx * dx + dy * dy;
260 
261  if (test_dist2 >= dist2)
262  continue;
263 
264  dist2 = test_dist2;
265  atEntry = atTestEntry;
266  }
267 
268  if (!atEntry)
269  {
270  SendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_NOTRIGGERFOUND);
271  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
272  return false;
273  }
274  }
275 
276  ShowTriggerListHelper(atEntry);
277 
278  int loc_idx = GetSessionDbLocaleIndex();
279 
280  AreaTrigger const* at = sObjectMgr.GetAreaTrigger(atEntry->id);
281  if (at)
282  PSendSysMessage(LANG_TRIGGER_REQ_LEVEL, at->requiredLevel);
283 
284  if (uint32 quest_id = sObjectMgr.GetQuestForAreaTrigger(atEntry->id))
285  {
286  SendSysMessage(LANG_TRIGGER_EXPLORE_QUEST);
287  ShowQuestListHelper(quest_id, loc_idx, pl);
288  }
289 
290  if (at)
291  {
292  if (at->requiredItem || at->requiredItem2)
293  {
294  SendSysMessage(LANG_TRIGGER_REQ_ITEMS);
295 
296  if (at->requiredItem)
297  ShowItemListHelper(at->requiredItem, loc_idx, pl);
298  if (at->requiredItem2)
299  ShowItemListHelper(at->requiredItem2, loc_idx, pl);
300  }
301 
302  if (at->requiredQuest)
303  {
304  SendSysMessage(LANG_TRIGGER_REQ_QUEST_NORMAL);
305  ShowQuestListHelper(at->requiredQuest, loc_idx, pl);
306  }
307 
308  if (at->heroicKey || at->heroicKey2)
309  {
310  SendSysMessage(LANG_TRIGGER_REQ_KEYS_HEROIC);
311 
312  if (at->heroicKey)
313  ShowItemListHelper(at->heroicKey, loc_idx, pl);
314  if (at->heroicKey2)
315  ShowItemListHelper(at->heroicKey2, loc_idx, pl);
316  }
317 
318  if (at->requiredQuestHeroic)
319  {
320  SendSysMessage(LANG_TRIGGER_REQ_QUEST_HEROIC);
321  ShowQuestListHelper(at->requiredQuestHeroic, loc_idx, pl);
322  }
323  }
324 
325  return true;
326 }

328 bool ChatHandler::HandleTriggerActiveCommand(char* /*args*/)
329 {
330  uint32 counter = 0; // Counter for figure out that we found smth.
331 
332  Player* pl = m_session->GetPlayer();
333 
334  // Search in AreaTable.dbc
335  for (uint32 id = 0; id < sAreaTriggerStore.GetNumRows(); ++id)
336  {
337  AreaTriggerEntry const* atEntry = sAreaTriggerStore.LookupEntry(id);
338  if (!atEntry)
339  continue;
340 
341  if (!IsPointInAreaTriggerZone(atEntry, pl->GetMapId(), pl->GetPositionX(), pl->GetPositionY(), pl->GetPositionZ()))
342  continue;
343 
344  ShowTriggerListHelper(atEntry);
345 
346  ++counter;
347  }
348 
349  if (counter == 0) // if counter == 0 then we found nth
350  SendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_NOTRIGGERFOUND);
351 
352  return true;
353 }
354 
355 bool ChatHandler::HandleTriggerNearCommand(char* args)
356 {
357  float distance = (!*args) ? 10.0f : (float)atof(args);
358  float dist2 = distance * distance;
359  uint32 counter = 0; // Counter for figure out that we found smth.
360 
361  Player* pl = m_session->GetPlayer();
362 
363  // Search triggers
364  for (uint32 id = 0; id < sAreaTriggerStore.GetNumRows(); ++id)
365  {
366  AreaTriggerEntry const* atEntry = sAreaTriggerStore.LookupEntry(id);
367  if (!atEntry)
368  continue;
369 
370  if (atEntry->mapid != m_session->GetPlayer()->GetMapId())
371  continue;
372 
373  float dx = atEntry->x - pl->GetPositionX();
374  float dy = atEntry->y - pl->GetPositionY();
375 
376  if (dx * dx + dy * dy > dist2)
377  continue;
378 
379  ShowTriggerListHelper(atEntry);
380 
381  ++counter;
382  }
383 
384  // Search trigger targets
385  for (uint32 id = 0; id < sAreaTriggerStore.GetNumRows(); ++id)
386  {
387  AreaTriggerEntry const* atEntry = sAreaTriggerStore.LookupEntry(id);
388  if (!atEntry)
389  continue;
390 
391  AreaTrigger const* at = sObjectMgr.GetAreaTrigger(atEntry->id);
392  if (!at)
393  continue;
394 
395  if (at->target_mapId != m_session->GetPlayer()->GetMapId())
396  continue;
397 
398  float dx = at->target_X - pl->GetPositionX();
399  float dy = at->target_Y - pl->GetPositionY();
400 
401  if (dx * dx + dy * dy > dist2)
402  continue;
403 
404  ShowTriggerTargetListHelper(atEntry->id, at);
405 
406  ++counter;
407  }
408 
409  if (counter == 0) // if counter == 0 then we found nth
410  SendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_NOTRIGGERFOUND);
411 
412  return true;
413 }

422 bool ChatHandler::HandleGoTriggerCommand(char* args)
423 {
424  Player* _player = m_session->GetPlayer();
425 
426  if (!*args)
427  return false;
428 
429  char* atIdStr = ExtractKeyFromLink(&args, areatriggerKeys);
430  if (!atIdStr)
431  return false;
432 
433  uint32 atId;
434  if (!ExtractUInt32(&atIdStr, atId))
435  return false;
436 
437  if (!atId)
438  return false;
439 
440  AreaTriggerEntry const* atEntry = sAreaTriggerStore.LookupEntry(atId);
441  if (!atEntry)
442  {
443  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_GOAREATRNOTFOUND, atId);
444  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
445  return false;
446  }
447 
448  const bool to_target = ExtractLiteralArg(&args, "target") != nullptr;
449  if (!to_target && *args) // can be fail also at syntax error
450  return false;
451 
452  if (to_target)
453  {
454  AreaTrigger const* at = sObjectMgr.GetAreaTrigger(atId);
455  if (!at)
456  {
457  PSendSysMessage(LANG_AREATRIGER_NOT_HAS_TARGET, atId);
458  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
459  return false;
460  }
461 
462  return HandleGoHelper(_player, at->target_mapId, at->target_X, at->target_Y, &at->target_Z);
463  }
464  return HandleGoHelper(_player, atEntry->mapid, atEntry->x, atEntry->y, &atEntry->z);
465 }

493 static char const* const creatureKeys[] =
494 {
495  "Hcreature",
496  "Hcreature_entry",
497  nullptr
498 };
499 
510 // teleport to creature
511 bool ChatHandler::HandleGoCreatureCommand(char* args)
512 {
513  if (!*args)
514  return false;
515 
516  Player* _player = m_session->GetPlayer();
517 
518  // "id" or number or [name] Shift-click form |color|Hcreature:creature_id|h[name]|h|r
519  int crType;
520  char* pParam1 = ExtractKeyFromLink(&args, creatureKeys, &crType);
521  if (!pParam1)
522  return false;
523 
524  // User wants to teleport to the NPC's template entry
525  if (crType == CREATURE_LINK_RAW && strcmp(pParam1, "id") == 0)
526  {
527  // number or [name] Shift-click form |color|Hcreature_entry:creature_id|h[name]|h|r
528  pParam1 = ExtractKeyFromLink(&args, "Hcreature_entry");
529  if (!pParam1)
530  return false;
531 
532  crType = CREATURE_LINK_ENTRY;
533  }
534 
535  CreatureData const* data = nullptr;
536  uint32 dbGuid = 0;
537  uint32 creatureEntry;
538 
539  switch (crType)
540  {
541  case CREATURE_LINK_ENTRY:
542  {
543  if (!ExtractUInt32(&pParam1, creatureEntry))
544  return false;
545 
546  if (!creatureEntry)
547  return false;
548 
549  if (!ObjectMgr::GetCreatureTemplate(creatureEntry))
550  {
551  SendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_GOCREATNOTFOUND);
552  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
553  return false;
554  }
555 
556  FindCreatureData worker(creatureEntry, m_session ? m_session->GetPlayer() : nullptr);
557 
558  sObjectMgr.DoCreatureData(worker);
559 
560  CreatureDataPair const* dataPair = worker.GetResult();
561  if (!dataPair)
562  break;
563 
564  dbGuid = dataPair->first;
565  data = &dataPair->second;
566  break;
567  }
568  case CREATURE_LINK_GUID:
569  {
570  if (!ExtractUInt32(&pParam1, dbGuid))
571  return false;
572 
573  data = sObjectMgr.GetCreatureData(dbGuid);
574  break;
575  }
576  case CREATURE_LINK_RAW:
577  {
578  if (ExtractUInt32(&pParam1, dbGuid))
579  data = sObjectMgr.GetCreatureData(dbGuid);
580  // Number is invalid - maybe the user specified the mob's name
581  else
582  {
583  std::string name = pParam1;
584  WorldDatabase.escape_string(name);
585  QueryResult* result = WorldDatabase.PQuery("SELECT creature.guid, creature_spawn_entry.guid "
586  "FROM creature, creature_template, creature_spawn_entry "
587  "WHERE (creature.id = creature_template.entry "
588  "OR (creature_spawn_entry.entry = creature_template.entry AND creature.guid = creature_spawn_entry.guid)) "
589  "AND creature_template.name LIKE '%%%s%%' LIMIT 1;", name.c_str());
590  if (!result)
591  {
592  SendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_GOCREATNOTFOUND);
593  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
594  return false;
595  }
596 
597  FindCreatureData worker(0, m_session ? m_session->GetPlayer() : nullptr);
598 
599  do
600  {
601  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
602  uint32 guid = fields[0].GetUInt32();
603 
604  CreatureDataPair const* cr_data = sObjectMgr.GetCreatureDataPair(guid);
605  if (!cr_data)
606  continue;
607 
608  worker(*cr_data);
609  } while (result->NextRow());
610 
611  delete result;
612 
613  CreatureDataPair const* dataPair = worker.GetResult();
614  if (!dataPair)
615  break;
616 
617  data = &dataPair->second;
618  }
619  break;
620  }
621  }
622 
623  if (!data)
624  {
625  //TODO::next par will be added in the future
626  // data is nullptr so this mean either the guid/entry provided was wrong or its a summoned creature. Lets give a chance to find a summoned creature.
627  /*WorldObject* wObj = nullptr;
628  do
629  {
630  if (dbGuid)
631  {
632  auto check = [dbGuid](Map * map) -> WorldObject*
633  {
634  return map->GetCreature(ObjectGuid(HIGHGUID_UNIT, dbGuid));
635  };
636 
637  wObj = sMapMgr.SearchOnAllLoadedMap(check);
638  break;
639  }
640 
641  if (creatureEntry)
642  {
643  auto check = [creatureEntry](Map * map) -> WorldObject*
644  {
645  return map->GetCreatureByEntry(creatureEntry);
646  };
647 
648  wObj = sMapMgr.SearchOnAllLoadedMap(check);
649  break;
650  }
651  } while (false);
652 
653  if (wObj)
654  {
655  float z = wObj->GetPositionZ();
656  return HandleGoHelper(_player, wObj->GetMapId(), wObj->GetPositionX(), wObj->GetPositionY(), &z);
657  }*/
658 
659  SendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_GOCREATNOTFOUND);
660  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
661  return false;
662  }
663 
664  if (Map* map = sMapMgr.FindMap(data->mapid))
665  {
666  if (map->IsContinent())
667  {
668  Creature* creature = nullptr;
669  if (dbGuid)
670  {
671  // check static creature store
672  creature = map->GetCreature(ObjectGuid(HIGHGUID_UNIT, dbGuid));
673  if (!creature)
674  {
675  // check creature with dynamic guid
676  creature = map->GetCreature(dbGuid);
677  }
678  }
679  /*else
680  creature = map->GetCreatureByEntry(data->id);*/
681 
682  if (creature)
683  {
684  float z = creature->GetPositionZ();
685  return HandleGoHelper(_player, data->mapid, creature->GetPositionX(), creature->GetPositionY(), &z);
686  }
687  }
688  }
689 
690  return HandleGoHelper(_player, data->mapid, data->posX, data->posY, &data->posZ);
691 }

707 // teleport to gameobject
708 bool ChatHandler::HandleGoObjectCommand(char* args)
709 {
710  Player* _player = m_session->GetPlayer();
711 
712  // number or [name] Shift-click form |color|Hgameobject:go_guid|h[name]|h|r
713  int goType;
714  char* pParam1 = ExtractKeyFromLink(&args, gameobjectKeys, &goType);
715  if (!pParam1)
716  return false;
717 
718  // User wants to teleport to the GO's template entry
719  if (goType == GAMEOBJECT_LINK_RAW && strcmp(pParam1, "id") == 0)
720  {
721  // number or [name] Shift-click form |color|Hgameobject_entry:creature_id|h[name]|h|r
722  pParam1 = ExtractKeyFromLink(&args, "Hgameobject_entry");
723  if (!pParam1)
724  return false;
725 
726  goType = GAMEOBJECT_LINK_ENTRY;
727  }
728 
729  GameObjectData const* data = nullptr;
730 
731  switch (goType)
732  {
733  case CREATURE_LINK_ENTRY:
734  {
735  uint32 tEntry;
736  if (!ExtractUInt32(&pParam1, tEntry))
737  return false;
738 
739  if (!tEntry)
740  return false;
741 
742  if (!ObjectMgr::GetGameObjectInfo(tEntry))
743  {
744  SendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_GOOBJNOTFOUND);
745  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
746  return false;
747  }
748 
749  FindGOData worker(tEntry, m_session ? m_session->GetPlayer() : nullptr);
750 
751  sObjectMgr.DoGOData(worker);
752 
753  GameObjectDataPair const* dataPair = worker.GetResult();
754 
755  if (!dataPair)
756  {
757  SendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_GOOBJNOTFOUND);
758  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
759  return false;
760  }
761 
762  data = &dataPair->second;
763  break;
764  }
765  case GAMEOBJECT_LINK_GUID:
766  {
767  uint32 lowguid;
768  if (!ExtractUInt32(&pParam1, lowguid))
769  return false;
770 
771  // by DB guid
772  data = sObjectMgr.GetGOData(lowguid);
773  if (!data)
774  {
775  SendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_GOOBJNOTFOUND);
776  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
777  return false;
778  }
779  break;
780  }
781  case GAMEOBJECT_LINK_RAW:
782  {
783  uint32 lowguid;
784  if (ExtractUInt32(&pParam1, lowguid))
785  {
786  // by DB guid
787  data = sObjectMgr.GetGOData(lowguid);
788  if (!data)
789  {
790  SendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_GOOBJNOTFOUND);
791  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
792  return false;
793  }
794  }
795  else
796  {
797  std::string name = pParam1;
798  WorldDatabase.escape_string(name);
799  QueryResult* result = WorldDatabase.PQuery("SELECT gameobject.guid, gameobject_spawn_entry.guid "
800  "FROM gameobject, gameobject_template, gameobject_spawn_entry "
801  "WHERE (gameobject.id = gameobject_template.entry "
802  "OR (gameobject_spawn_entry.entry = gameobject_template.entry AND gameobject.guid = gameobject_spawn_entry.guid)) "
803  "AND gameobject_template.name LIKE '%%%s%%' LIMIT 1;", name.c_str());
804  if (!result)
805  {
806  SendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_GOOBJNOTFOUND);
807  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
808  return false;
809  }
810 
811  FindGOData worker(0, m_session ? m_session->GetPlayer() : nullptr);
812 
813  do
814  {
815  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
816  uint32 guid = fields[0].GetUInt32();
817 
818  GameObjectDataPair const* go_data = sObjectMgr.GetGODataPair(guid);
819  if (!go_data)
820  continue;
821 
822  worker(*go_data);
823  }
824  while (result->NextRow());
825 
826  delete result;
827 
828  GameObjectDataPair const* dataPair = worker.GetResult();
829  if (!dataPair)
830  {
831  SendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_GOOBJNOTFOUND);
832  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
833  return false;
834  }
835 
836  data = &dataPair->second;
837  }
838  break;
839  }
840  }
841 
842  return HandleGoHelper(_player, data->mapid, data->posX, data->posY, &data->posZ);
843 }
844 
845 bool ChatHandler::HandleGameObjectTargetCommand(char* args)
846 {
847  Player* pl = m_session->GetPlayer();
848  QueryResult* result;
849  GameEventMgr::ActiveEvents const& activeEventsList = sGameEventMgr.GetActiveEventList();
850  if (*args)
851  {
852  // number or [name] Shift-click form |color|Hgameobject_entry:go_id|h[name]|h|r
853  char* cId = ExtractKeyFromLink(&args, "Hgameobject_entry");
854  if (!cId)
855  return false;
856 
857  uint32 id;
858  if (ExtractUInt32(&cId, id))
859  {
860  result = WorldDatabase.PQuery("SELECT guid, id, position_x, position_y, position_z, orientation, map, (POW(position_x - '%f', 2) + POW(position_y - '%f', 2) + POW(position_z - '%f', 2)) AS order_ FROM gameobject WHERE map = '%i' AND guid = '%u' ORDER BY order_ ASC LIMIT 1",
861  pl->GetPositionX(), pl->GetPositionY(), pl->GetPositionZ(), pl->GetMapId(), id);
862  }
863  else
864  {
865  std::string name = cId;
866  WorldDatabase.escape_string(name);
867  result = WorldDatabase.PQuery(
868  "SELECT guid, id, position_x, position_y, position_z, orientation, map, (POW(position_x - %f, 2) + POW(position_y - %f, 2) + POW(position_z - %f, 2)) AS order_ "
869  "FROM gameobject,gameobject_template WHERE gameobject_template.entry = gameobject.id AND map = %i AND name " _LIKE_ " " _CONCAT3_("'%%'", "'%s'", "'%%'")" ORDER BY order_ ASC LIMIT 1",
870  pl->GetPositionX(), pl->GetPositionY(), pl->GetPositionZ(), pl->GetMapId(), name.c_str());
871  }
872  }
873  else
874  {
875  std::ostringstream eventFilter;
876  eventFilter << " AND (event IS NULL ";
877  bool initString = true;
878 
879  for (uint16 itr : activeEventsList)
880  {
881  if (initString)
882  {
883  eventFilter << "OR event IN (" << itr;
884  initString = false;
885  }
886  else
887  eventFilter << "," << itr;
888  }
889 
890  if (!initString)
891  eventFilter << "))";
892  else
893  eventFilter << ")";
894 
895  result = WorldDatabase.PQuery("SELECT gameobject.guid, id, position_x, position_y, position_z, orientation, map, "
896  "(POW(position_x - %f, 2) + POW(position_y - %f, 2) + POW(position_z - %f, 2)) AS order_ FROM gameobject "
897  "LEFT OUTER JOIN game_event_gameobject on gameobject.guid=game_event_gameobject.guid WHERE map = '%i' %s ORDER BY order_ ASC LIMIT 10",
898  pl->GetPositionX(), pl->GetPositionY(), pl->GetPositionZ(), pl->GetMapId(), eventFilter.str().c_str());
899  }
900 
901  if (!result)
902  {
903  SendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_TARGETOBJNOTFOUND);
904  return true;
905  }
906 
907  bool found = false;
908  float x, y, z, o;
909  uint32 lowguid, id;
910  uint16 mapid;
911 
912  do
913  {
914  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
915  lowguid = fields[0].GetUInt32();
916  id = fields[1].GetUInt32();
917  x = fields[2].GetFloat();
918  y = fields[3].GetFloat();
919  z = fields[4].GetFloat();
920  o = fields[5].GetFloat();
921  mapid = fields[6].GetUInt16();
922  uint16 pool_id = sPoolMgr.IsPartOfAPool<GameObject>(lowguid);
923  if (!pool_id || pl->GetMap()->GetPersistentState()->IsSpawnedPoolObject<GameObject>(lowguid))
924  found = true;
925  }
926  while (result->NextRow() && (!found));
927 
928  delete result;
929 
930  if (!found)
931  {
932  PSendSysMessage(LANG_GAMEOBJECT_NOT_EXIST, id);
933  return false;
934  }
935 
936 
937  const char* name = "";
938  GameObjectInfo const* goI = ObjectMgr::GetGameObjectInfo(id);
939  if (goI)
940  name = goI->name;
941 
942  GameObject* target = m_session->GetPlayer()->GetMap()->GetGameObject(lowguid);
943 
944  PSendSysMessage(LANG_GAMEOBJECT_DETAIL, lowguid, name, lowguid, id, x, y, z, uint32(mapid), o);
945 
946  if (target)
947  {
948  if (auto vector = sObjectMgr.GetAllRandomGameObjectEntries(target->GetDbGuid()))
949  {
950  std::string output;
951  for (uint32 entry : *vector)
952  output += std::to_string(entry) + ",";
953  PSendSysMessage("GO is part of gameobject_spawn_entry: %s", output.data());
954  }
955 
956  time_t curRespawnDelay = target->GetRespawnTimeEx() - time(nullptr);
957  if (curRespawnDelay < 0)
958  curRespawnDelay = 0;
959 
960  std::string curRespawnDelayStr = secsToTimeString(curRespawnDelay, true);
961  std::string defRespawnDelayStr = secsToTimeString(target->GetRespawnDelay(), true);
962 
963  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_RAWPAWNTIMES, defRespawnDelayStr.c_str(), curRespawnDelayStr.c_str());
964 
965  ShowNpcOrGoSpawnInformation<GameObject>(target->GetGUIDLow());
966 
967  if (SpawnGroupEntry* groupEntry = pl->GetMap()->GetMapDataContainer().GetSpawnGroupByGuid(target->GetDbGuid(), TYPEID_GAMEOBJECT))
968  PSendSysMessage("Spawn Group: %u", groupEntry->Id);
969 
970  if (target->GetGoType() == GAMEOBJECT_TYPE_DOOR)
971  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_GO_STATUS_DOOR, uint32(target->GetGoState()), uint32(target->GetLootState()), GetOnOffStr(target->IsCollisionEnabled()), goI && goI->door.startOpen ? "open" : "closed");
972  else
973  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_GO_STATUS, uint32(target->GetGoState()), uint32(target->GetLootState()), GetOnOffStr(target->IsCollisionEnabled()));
974  }
975  return true;
976 }

978 // delete object by selection or guid
979 bool ChatHandler::HandleGameObjectDeleteCommand(char* args)
980 {
981  // number or [name] Shift-click form |color|Hgameobject:go_guid|h[name]|h|r
982  uint32 lowguid;
983  if (!ExtractUint32KeyFromLink(&args, "Hgameobject", lowguid))
984  return false;
985 
986  if (!lowguid)
987  return false;
988 
989  GameObject* obj = nullptr;
990 
991  // by DB guid
992  if (GameObjectData const* go_data = sObjectMgr.GetGOData(lowguid))
993  obj = GetGameObjectWithGuid(lowguid, go_data->id);
994 
995  if (!obj)
996  {
997  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_OBJNOTFOUND, lowguid);
998  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
999  return false;
1000  }
1001 
1002  if (ObjectGuid ownerGuid = obj->GetOwnerGuid())
1003  {
1004  Unit* owner = ObjectAccessor::GetUnit(*m_session->GetPlayer(), ownerGuid);
1005  if (!owner || !ownerGuid.IsPlayer())
1006  {
1007  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_DELOBJREFERCREATURE, obj->GetGUIDLow(), ownerGuid.GetString().c_str());
1008  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1009  return false;
1010  }
1011 
1012  owner->RemoveGameObject(obj, false);
1013  }
1014 
1015  obj->SetRespawnTime(0); // not save respawn time
1016  obj->Delete();
1017  obj->DeleteFromDB();
1018 
1019  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_DELOBJMESSAGE, obj->GetGUIDLow());
1020 
1021  return true;
1022 }

1059 bool ChatHandler::HandleGameObjectMoveCommand(char* args)
1060 {
1061  // number or [name] Shift-click form |color|Hgameobject:go_guid|h[name]|h|r
1062  uint32 lowguid;
1063  if (!ExtractUint32KeyFromLink(&args, "Hgameobject", lowguid))
1064  return false;
1065

1067  return false;
1068 
1069  GameObject* obj = nullptr;
1070

1073  obj = GetGameObjectWithGuid(lowguid, go_data->id);
1074 
1075  if (!obj)
1076  {
1077  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_OBJNOTFOUND, lowguid);
1078  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1079  return false;
1080  }

1083  {

1090 
1091  map->Add(obj);
1092  }
1093  else
1094  {
1095  float x;
1096  if (!ExtractFloat(&args, x))
1097  return false;
1098 
1099  float y;
1100  if (!ExtractFloat(&args, y))
1101  return false;
1102 
1103  float z;
1104  if (!ExtractFloat(&args, z))
1105  return false;
1106 
1107  if (!MapManager::IsValidMapCoord(obj->GetMapId(), x, y, z))
1108  {
1109  PSendSysMessage(LANG_INVALID_TARGET_COORD, x, y, obj->GetMapId());
1110  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1111  return false;
1112  }
1113 
1114  Map* map = obj->GetMap();
1115  map->Remove(obj, false);
1116 
1117  obj->Relocate(x, y, z, obj->GetOrientation());
1118 
1119  map->Add(obj);
1120  }
1121 
1122  obj->SaveToDB();
1123  obj->Refresh();
1124 
1125  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_MOVEOBJMESSAGE, obj->GetGUIDLow(), obj->GetGOInfo()->name, obj->GetGUIDLow());
1126 
1127  return true;
1128 }

1130 // spawn go
1131 bool ChatHandler::HandleGameObjectAddCommand(char* args)
1132 {
1133  // number or [name] Shift-click form |color|Hgameobject_entry:go_id|h[name]|h|r
1134  uint32 id;
1135  if (!ExtractUint32KeyFromLink(&args, "Hgameobject_entry", id))
1136  return false;
1137 
1138  if (!id)
1139  return false;
1140 
1141  int32 spawntimeSecsmin;
1142  if (!ExtractOptInt32(&args, spawntimeSecsmin, 0))
1143  return false;
1144 
1145  const GameObjectInfo* gInfo = ObjectMgr::GetGameObjectInfo(id);
1146  if (!gInfo)
1147  {
1148  PSendSysMessage(LANG_GAMEOBJECT_NOT_EXIST, id);
1149  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1150  return false;
1151  }
1152 
1153  if (gInfo->displayId && !sGameObjectDisplayInfoStore.LookupEntry(gInfo->displayId))
1154  {
1155  // report to DB errors log as in loading case
1156  sLog.outErrorDb("Gameobject (Entry %u GoType: %u) have invalid displayId (%u), not spawned.", id, gInfo->type, gInfo->displayId);
1157  PSendSysMessage(LANG_GAMEOBJECT_HAVE_INVALID_DATA, id);
1158  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1159  return false;
1160  }
1161 
1162  Player* plr = m_session->GetPlayer();
1163  float x = float(plr->GetPositionX());
1164  float y = float(plr->GetPositionY());
1165  float z = float(plr->GetPositionZ());
1166  float o = float(plr->GetOrientation());
1167  Map* map = plr->GetMap();
1168 
1169  // used guids from specially reserved range (can be 0 if no free values)
1170  uint32 db_lowGUID = sObjectMgr.GenerateStaticGameObjectLowGuid();
1171  if (!db_lowGUID)
1172  {
1173  SendSysMessage(LANG_NO_FREE_STATIC_GUID_FOR_SPAWN);
1174  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1175  return false;
1176  }
1177 
1178  GameObject* pGameObj = GameObject::CreateGameObject(gInfo->id);
1179  QuaternionData data(0.f, 0.f, sin(o / 2), cos(o / 2));
1180  if (!pGameObj->Create(db_lowGUID, db_lowGUID, gInfo->id, map, plr->GetPhaseMaskForSpawn(), x, y, z, o, data))
1181  {
1182  delete pGameObj;
1183  return false;
1184  }
1185 
1186  if (spawntimeSecsmin)
1187  pGameObj->SetRespawnTime(spawntimeSecsmin);
1188 
1189  // fill the gameobject data and save to the db
1190  pGameObj->SaveToDB(map->GetId(), (1 << map->GetSpawnMode()), plr->GetPhaseMaskForSpawn());
1191 
1192  // this will generate a new guid if the object is in an instance
1193  if (!pGameObj->LoadFromDB(db_lowGUID, map, db_lowGUID, 0))
1194  {
1195  delete pGameObj;
1196  return false;
1197  }
1198 
1199  DEBUG_LOG(GetMangosString(LANG_GAMEOBJECT_CURRENT), gInfo->name, db_lowGUID, x, y, z, o);
1200 
1201  sObjectMgr.AddGameobjectToGrid(db_lowGUID, sObjectMgr.GetGOData(db_lowGUID));
1202 
1203  PSendSysMessage(LANG_GAMEOBJECT_ADD, id, gInfo->name, db_lowGUID, x, y, z);
1204  return true;
1205 }

1244 bool ChatHandler::HandleGameObjectNearCommand(char* args)
1245 {
1246  float distance;
1247  if (!ExtractOptFloat(&args, distance, 10.0f))
1248  return false;
1249 
1250  SendSysMessage("Database spawns around:");
1251 
1252  uint32 count = 0;
1253 
1254  Player* pl = m_session->GetPlayer();
1255  QueryResult* result = WorldDatabase.PQuery("SELECT guid, id, position_x, position_y, position_z, map, "
1256  "(POW(position_x - '%f', 2) + POW(position_y - '%f', 2) + POW(position_z - '%f', 2)) AS order_ "
1257  "FROM gameobject WHERE map='%u' AND (POW(position_x - '%f', 2) + POW(position_y - '%f', 2) + POW(position_z - '%f', 2)) <= '%f' ORDER BY order_",
1258  pl->GetPositionX(), pl->GetPositionY(), pl->GetPositionZ(),
1259  pl->GetMapId(), pl->GetPositionX(), pl->GetPositionY(), pl->GetPositionZ(), distance * distance);
1260 
1261  if (result)
1262  {
1263  do
1264  {
1265  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
1266  uint32 guid = fields[0].GetUInt32();
1267  uint32 entry = fields[1].GetUInt32();
1268  float x = fields[2].GetFloat();
1269  float y = fields[3].GetFloat();
1270  float z = fields[4].GetFloat();
1271  int mapid = fields[5].GetUInt16();
1272 
1273  GameObjectInfo const* gInfo = ObjectMgr::GetGameObjectInfo(entry);
1274 
1275  const char* name = "Random (gameobject_spawn_entry)";
1276  if (gInfo)
1277  name = gInfo->name;
1278 
1279  uint32 spawnGroupId = 0;
1280  if (SpawnGroupEntry* groupEntry = pl->GetMap()->GetMapDataContainer().GetSpawnGroupByGuid(guid, TYPEID_GAMEOBJECT))
1281  spawnGroupId = groupEntry->Id;
1282 
1283  PSendSysMessage(LANG_GO_MIXED_LIST_CHAT, guid, PrepareStringNpcOrGoSpawnInformation<GameObject>(guid).c_str(), entry, guid, name, x, y, z, mapid, spawnGroupId);
1284 
1285 
1286  ++count;
1287  }
1288  while (result->NextRow());
1289 
1290  delete result;
1291  }
1292 
1293  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_NEAROBJMESSAGE, distance, count);
1294  return true;
1295 }

1367  obj = GetGameObjectWithGuid(lowguid, go_data->id);
1368 
1369  if (!obj)
1370  {
1371  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_OBJNOTFOUND, lowguid);
1372  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1373  return false;
1374  }
1375 
1376  obj->SetLootState(GO_JUST_DEACTIVATED);
1377  obj->SetRespawnDelay(10000);
1378  obj->SetForcedDespawn();
1379 
1380  return true;
1381 }

1383 bool ChatHandler::HandleGameObjectNearSpawnedCommand(char* args)
1384 {
1385  float distance;
1386  if (!ExtractOptFloat(&args, distance, 10.0f))
1387  return false;
1388 
1389  GameObjectList gameobjects;
1390  Player* player = m_session->GetPlayer();
1391 
1392  MaNGOS::GameObjectInPosRangeCheck go_check(*player, player->GetPositionX(), player->GetPositionY(), player->GetPositionZ(), distance);
1393  MaNGOS::GameObjectListSearcher<MaNGOS::GameObjectInPosRangeCheck> checker(gameobjects, go_check);
1394  Cell::VisitGridObjects(player, checker, distance);
1395 
1396  for (GameObject* go : gameobjects)
1397  {
1398  uint32 entry = go->GetEntry();
1399  GameObjectInfo const* goInfo = ObjectMgr::GetGameObjectInfo(entry);
1400 
1401  if (!goInfo)
1402  continue;
1403 
1404  float x, y, z;
1405  go->GetPosition(x, y, z);
1406  ObjectGuid guid = go->GetObjectGuid();
1407  uint32 spawnGroupId = 0;
1408  if (SpawnGroupEntry* groupEntry = player->GetMap()->GetMapDataContainer().GetSpawnGroupByGuid(guid, TYPEID_GAMEOBJECT))
1409  spawnGroupId = groupEntry->Id;
1410  PSendSysMessage(LANG_GO_MIXED_LIST_CHAT, guid.GetCounter(), PrepareStringNpcOrGoSpawnInformation<GameObject>(guid).c_str(), entry, guid, goInfo->name, x, y, z, go->GetMapId(), spawnGroupId);
1411  }
1412 
1413  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_NEAROBJMESSAGE, distance, gameobjects.size());
1414  return true;
1415 }

1432 void ChatHandler::ShowAchievementListHelper(AchievementEntry const* achEntry, LocaleConstant loc, time_t const* date /*= nullptr*/, Player* target /*= nullptr */)
1433 {
1434  std::string name = achEntry->name[loc];
1435 
1436  ObjectGuid guid = target ? target->GetObjectGuid() : ObjectGuid();
1437 
1438  // |color|Hachievement:achievement_id:player_guid_hex:completed_0_1:mm:dd:yy_from_2000:criteriaMask:0:0:0|h[name]|h|r
1439  std::ostringstream ss;
1440  if (m_session)
1441  {
1442  ss << achEntry->ID << " - |cffffffff|Hachievement:" << achEntry->ID << ":" << std::hex << guid.GetRawValue() << std::dec;
1443  if (date)
1444  {
1445  // complete date
1446  tm* aTm = localtime(date);
1447  ss << ":1:" << aTm->tm_mon + 1 << ":" << aTm->tm_mday << ":" << (aTm->tm_year + 1900 - 2000) << ":";
1448 
1449  // complete criteria mask (all bits set)
1450  ss << uint32(-1) << ":" << uint32(-1) << ":" << uint32(-1) << ":" << uint32(-1) << ":";
1451  }
1452  else
1453  {
1454  // complete date
1455  ss << ":0:0:0:-1:";
1456 
1457  // complete criteria mask
1458  if (target)
1459  {
1460  uint32 criteriaMask[4] = {0, 0, 0, 0};
1461 
1462  if (AchievementMgr const* mgr = target ? &target->GetAchievementMgr() : nullptr)
1463  if (AchievementCriteriaEntryList const* criteriaList = sAchievementMgr.GetAchievementCriteriaByAchievement(achEntry->ID))
1464  for (auto itr : *criteriaList)
1465  if (mgr->IsCompletedCriteria(itr, achEntry))
1466  criteriaMask[(itr->showOrder - 1) / 32] |= (1 << ((itr->showOrder - 1) % 32));
1467 
1468  for (unsigned int i : criteriaMask)
1469  ss << i << ":";
1470  }
1471  else
1472  ss << "0:0:0:0:";
1473  }
1474 
1475  ss << "|h[" << name << " " << localeNames[loc] << "]|h|r";
1476  }
1477  else
1478  ss << achEntry->ID << " - " << name << " " << localeNames[loc];
1479 
1480  if (target && date)
1481  ss << " [" << TimeToTimestampStr(*date) << "]";
1482 
1483  SendSysMessage(ss.str().c_str());
1484 }

1486 bool ChatHandler::HandleLookupAchievementCommand(char* args)
1487 {
1488  if (!*args)
1489  return false;
1490 
1491  // Can be nullptr at console call
1492  Player* target = getSelectedPlayer();
1493 
1494  std::string namepart = args;
1495  std::wstring wnamepart;
1496 
1497  if (!Utf8toWStr(namepart, wnamepart))
1498  return false;
1499 
1500  // converting string that we try to find to lower case
1501  wstrToLower(wnamepart);
1502 
1503  uint32 counter = 0; // Counter for figure out that we found smth.
1504 
1505  for (uint32 id = 0; id < sAchievementStore.GetNumRows(); ++id)
1506  {
1507  AchievementEntry const* achEntry = sAchievementStore.LookupEntry(id);
1508  if (!achEntry)
1509  continue;
1510 
1511  int loc = GetSessionDbcLocale();
1512  std::string name = achEntry->name[loc];
1513  if (name.empty())
1514  continue;
1515 
1516  if (!Utf8FitTo(name, wnamepart))
1517  {
1518  loc = 0;
1519  for (; loc < MAX_LOCALE; ++loc)
1520  {
1521  if (loc == GetSessionDbcLocale())
1522  continue;
1523 
1524  name = achEntry->name[loc];
1525  if (name.empty())
1526  continue;
1527 
1528  if (Utf8FitTo(name, wnamepart))
1529  break;
1530  }
1531  }
1532 
1533  if (loc < MAX_LOCALE)
1534  {
1535  CompletedAchievementData const* completed = target ? target->GetAchievementMgr().GetCompleteData(id) : nullptr;
1536  ShowAchievementListHelper(achEntry, LocaleConstant(loc), completed ? &completed->date : nullptr, target);
1537  ++counter;
1538  }
1539  }
1540 
1541  if (counter == 0) // if counter == 0 then we found nth
1542  SendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_ACHIEVEMENT_NOTFOUND);
1543  return true;
1544 }

1546 bool ChatHandler::HandleCharacterAchievementsCommand(char* args)
1547 {
1548  Player* target;
1549  if (!ExtractPlayerTarget(&args, &target))
1550  return false;
1551 
1552  LocaleConstant loc = GetSessionDbcLocale();
1553 
1554  CompletedAchievementMap const& complitedList = target->GetAchievementMgr().GetCompletedAchievements();
1555  for (const auto& itr : complitedList)
1556  {
1557  AchievementEntry const* achEntry = sAchievementStore.LookupEntry(itr.first);
1558  ShowAchievementListHelper(achEntry, loc, &itr.second.date, target);
1559  }
1560  return true;
1561 }

1563 void ChatHandler::ShowFactionListHelper(FactionEntry const* factionEntry, LocaleConstant loc, FactionState const* repState /*= nullptr*/, Player* target /*= nullptr */)
1564 {
1565  std::string name = factionEntry->name[loc];
1566 
1567  // send faction in "id - [faction] rank reputation [visible] [at war] [own team] [unknown] [invisible] [inactive]" format
1568  // or "id - [faction] [no reputation]" format
1569  std::ostringstream ss;
1570  if (m_session)
1571  ss << factionEntry->ID << " - |cffffffff|Hfaction:" << factionEntry->ID << "|h[" << name << " " << localeNames[loc] << "]|h|r";
1572  else
1573  ss << factionEntry->ID << " - " << name << " " << localeNames[loc];
1574 
1575  if (repState) // and then target!=nullptr also
1576  {
1577  ReputationRank rank = target->GetReputationMgr().GetRank(factionEntry);
1578  std::string rankName = GetMangosString(ReputationRankStrIndex[rank]);
1579 
1580  ss << " " << rankName << "|h|r (" << target->GetReputationMgr().GetReputation(factionEntry) << ")";
1581 
1582  if (repState->Flags & FACTION_FLAG_VISIBLE)
1583  ss << GetMangosString(LANG_FACTION_VISIBLE);
1584  if (repState->Flags & FACTION_FLAG_AT_WAR)
1585  ss << GetMangosString(LANG_FACTION_ATWAR);
1586  if (repState->Flags & FACTION_FLAG_PEACE_FORCED)
1587  ss << GetMangosString(LANG_FACTION_PEACE_FORCED);
1588  if (repState->Flags & FACTION_FLAG_HIDDEN)
1589  ss << GetMangosString(LANG_FACTION_HIDDEN);
1590  if (repState->Flags & FACTION_FLAG_INVISIBLE_FORCED)
1591  ss << GetMangosString(LANG_FACTION_INVISIBLE_FORCED);
1592  if (repState->Flags & FACTION_FLAG_INACTIVE)
1593  ss << GetMangosString(LANG_FACTION_INACTIVE);
1594  }
1595  else if (target)
1596  ss << GetMangosString(LANG_FACTION_NOREPUTATION);
1597 
1598  SendSysMessage(ss.str().c_str());
1599 }

1613  return false;

1615  // converting string that we try to find to lower case

1661 bool ChatHandler::HandleModifyRepCommand(char* args)
1662 {
1663  if (!*args)
1664  return false;
1665 
1666  Player* target = getSelectedPlayer();
1667 
1668  if (!target)
1669  {
1670  SendSysMessage(LANG_PLAYER_NOT_FOUND);
1671  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1672  return false;
1673  }
1674 
1675  // check online security
1676  if (HasLowerSecurity(target))
1677  return false;
1678 
1679  uint32 factionId;
1680  if (!ExtractUint32KeyFromLink(&args, "Hfaction", factionId))
1681  return false;
1682 
1683  if (!factionId)
1684  return false;
1685 
1686  int32 amount = 0;
1687  if (!ExtractInt32(&args, amount))
1688  {
1689  char* rankTxt = ExtractLiteralArg(&args);
1690  if (!rankTxt)
1691  return false;
1692 
1693  std::string rankStr = rankTxt;
1694  std::wstring wrankStr;
1695  if (!Utf8toWStr(rankStr, wrankStr))
1696  return false;
1697  wstrToLower(wrankStr);
1698 
1699  int r = 0;
1700  amount = -42000;
1701  for (; r < MAX_REPUTATION_RANK; ++r)
1702  {
1703  std::string rank = GetMangosString(ReputationRankStrIndex[r]);
1704  if (rank.empty())
1705  continue;
1706 
1707  std::wstring wrank;
1708  if (!Utf8toWStr(rank, wrank))
1709  continue;
1710 
1711  wstrToLower(wrank);
1712 
1713  if (wrank.substr(0, wrankStr.size()) == wrankStr)
1714  {
1715  int32 delta;
1716  if (!ExtractOptInt32(&args, delta, 0) || (delta < 0) || (delta > ReputationMgr::PointsInRank[r] - 1))
1717  {
1718  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_FACTION_DELTA, (ReputationMgr::PointsInRank[r] - 1));
1719  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1720  return false;
1721  }
1722  amount += delta;
1723  break;
1724  }
1725  amount += ReputationMgr::PointsInRank[r];
1726  }
1727  if (r >= MAX_REPUTATION_RANK)
1728  {
1729  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_FACTION_INVPARAM, rankTxt);
1730  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1731  return false;
1732  }
1733  }
1734 
1735  FactionEntry const* factionEntry = sFactionStore.LookupEntry(factionId);
1736 
1737  if (!factionEntry)
1738  {
1739  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_FACTION_UNKNOWN, factionId);
1740  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1741  return false;
1742  }
1743 
1744  if (!factionEntry->HasReputation())
1745  {
1746  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_FACTION_NOREP_ERROR, factionEntry->name[GetSessionDbcLocale()], factionId);
1747  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1748  return false;
1749  }
1750 
1751  target->GetReputationMgr().SetReputation(factionEntry, amount);
1752  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_MODIFY_REP, factionEntry->name[GetSessionDbcLocale()], factionId,
1753  GetNameLink(target).c_str(), target->GetReputationMgr().GetReputation(factionEntry));
1754  return true;
1755 }

1757 //-----------------------Npc Commands-----------------------
1758 // add spawn of creature
1759 bool ChatHandler::HandleNpcAddCommand(char* args)
1760 {
1761  if (!*args)
1762  return false;
1763 
1764  uint32 id;
1765  if (!ExtractUint32KeyFromLink(&args, "Hcreature_entry", id))
1766  return false;
1767 
1768  CreatureInfo const* cinfo = ObjectMgr::GetCreatureTemplate(id);
1769  if (!cinfo)
1770  {
1771  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_INVALIDCREATUREID, id);
1772  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1773  return false;
1774  }
1775 
1776  Player* chr = m_session->GetPlayer();
1777  CreatureCreatePos pos(chr, chr->GetOrientation());
1778  Map* map = chr->GetMap();
1779 
1780  Creature* pCreature = new Creature;
1781 
1782  // used guids from specially reserved range (can be 0 if no free values)
1783  uint32 lowguid = sObjectMgr.GenerateStaticCreatureLowGuid();
1784  if (!lowguid)
1785  {
1786  SendSysMessage(LANG_NO_FREE_STATIC_GUID_FOR_SPAWN);
1787  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1788  delete pCreature;
1789  return false;
1790  }
1791 
1792  if (!pCreature->Create(lowguid, lowguid, pos, cinfo))
1793  {
1794  delete pCreature;
1795  return false;
1796  }
1797 
1798  pCreature->SaveToDB(map->GetId(), (1 << map->GetSpawnMode()), chr->GetPhaseMaskForSpawn());
1799 
1800  uint32 db_guid = pCreature->GetGUIDLow();
1801 
1802  // To call _LoadGoods(); _LoadQuests(); CreateTrainerSpells();
1803  pCreature->LoadFromDB(db_guid, map, db_guid, 0);
1804  return true;
1805 }

1953 // change level of creature or pet
1954 bool ChatHandler::HandleNpcChangeLevelCommand(char* args)
1955 {
1956  if (!*args)
1957  return false;
1958 
1959  uint8 lvl = (uint8) atoi(args);
1960  if (lvl < 1 || lvl > sWorld.getConfig(CONFIG_UINT32_MAX_PLAYER_LEVEL) + 3)
1961  {
1962  SendSysMessage(LANG_BAD_VALUE);
1963  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1964  return false;
1965  }
1966 
1967  Creature* pCreature = getSelectedCreature();
1968  if (!pCreature)
1969  {
1970  SendSysMessage(LANG_SELECT_CREATURE);
1971  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
1972  return false;
1973  }
1974 
1975  if (pCreature->IsPet())
1976  ((Pet*)pCreature)->GivePetLevel(lvl);
1977  else
1978  {
1979  pCreature->SetMaxHealth(100 + 30 * lvl);
1980  pCreature->SetHealth(100 + 30 * lvl);
1981  pCreature->SetLevel(lvl);
1982 
1983  if (pCreature->HasStaticDBSpawnData())
1984  pCreature->SaveToDB();
1985  }
1986 
1987  return true;
1988 }

2016 bool ChatHandler::HandleNpcDeleteCommand(char* args)

2024  if (!ExtractUint32KeyFromLink(&args, "Hcreature", lowguid))

2028  return false;
2029 
2030  if (CreatureData const* data = sObjectMgr.GetCreatureData(lowguid))
2031  unit = m_session->GetPlayer()->GetMap()->GetCreature(data->GetObjectGuid(lowguid));
2032  }
2033  else
2034  unit = getSelectedCreature();
2035 
2036  if (!unit)
2037  {
2038  SendSysMessage(LANG_SELECT_CREATURE);
2039  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
2040  return false;
2041  }
2042 
2043  switch (unit->GetSubtype())
2044  {
2045  case CREATURE_SUBTYPE_GENERIC:
2046  {
2047  unit->CombatStop();
2048  if (CreatureData const* data = sObjectMgr.GetCreatureData(unit->GetGUIDLow()))
2049  {
2050  Creature::AddToRemoveListInMaps(unit->GetGUIDLow(), data);
2051  Creature::DeleteFromDB(unit->GetGUIDLow(), data);
2052  }
2053  else
2054  unit->AddObjectToRemoveList();
2055  break;
2056  }
2057  case CREATURE_SUBTYPE_PET:
2058  ((Pet*)unit)->Unsummon(PET_SAVE_AS_CURRENT);
2059  break;
2060  case CREATURE_SUBTYPE_TOTEM:
2061  ((Totem*)unit)->UnSummon();
2062  break;
2063  case CREATURE_SUBTYPE_TEMPORARY_SUMMON:
2064  ((TemporarySpawn*)unit)->UnSummon();
2065  break;
2066  default:
2067  return false;
2068  }
2069 
2070  SendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_DELCREATMESSAGE);
2071 
2072  return true;
2073 }
2074 
2075 // move selected creature
2076 bool ChatHandler::HandleNpcMoveCommand(char* args)
2077 {
2078  uint32 lowguid = 0;
2079  Player* player = m_session->GetPlayer();
2080 
2081  Creature* pCreature = getSelectedCreature();
2082  if (!pCreature)
2083  {
2084  // number or [name] Shift-click form |color|Hcreature:creature_guid|h[name]|h|r
2085  if (!ExtractUint32KeyFromLink(&args, "Hcreature", lowguid))
2086  return false;
2087 
2088  CreatureData const* data = sObjectMgr.GetCreatureData(lowguid);
2089  if (!data)
2090  {
2091  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_CREATGUIDNOTFOUND, lowguid);
2092  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
2093  return false;
2094  }
2095 
2096  if (player->GetMapId() != data->mapid)
2097  {
2098  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_CREATUREATSAMEMAP, lowguid);
2099  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
2100  return false;
2101  }
2102 
2103  pCreature = player->GetMap()->GetCreature(data->GetObjectGuid(lowguid));
2104  }
2105  else
2106  lowguid = pCreature->GetGUIDLow();
2107 
2108  float x = player->GetPositionX();
2109  float y = player->GetPositionY();
2110  float z = player->GetPositionZ();
2111  float o = player->GetOrientation();
2112 
2113  if (pCreature)
2114  {
2115  if (CreatureData const* data = sObjectMgr.GetCreatureData(pCreature->GetGUIDLow()))
2116  {
2117  const_cast<CreatureData*>(data)->posX = x;
2118  const_cast<CreatureData*>(data)->posY = y;
2119  const_cast<CreatureData*>(data)->posZ = z;
2120  const_cast<CreatureData*>(data)->orientation = o;
2121  }
2122  pCreature->GetMap()->CreatureRelocation(pCreature, x, y, z, o);
2123  pCreature->GetMotionMaster()->Initialize();
2124  if (pCreature->IsAlive()) // dead creature will reset movement generator at respawn
2125  {
2126  pCreature->SetDeathState(JUST_DIED);
2127  pCreature->Respawn();
2128  }
2129  }
2130 
2131  WorldDatabase.PExecuteLog("UPDATE creature SET position_x = '%f', position_y = '%f', position_z = '%f', orientation = '%f' WHERE guid = '%u'", x, y, z, o, lowguid);
2132  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_CREATUREMOVED);
2133  return true;
2134 }
2135 
2148 bool ChatHandler::HandleNpcSetMoveTypeCommand(char* args)
2149 {
2150  // 3 arguments:
2151  // GUID (optional - you can also select the creature)
2152  // stay|random|way (determines the kind of movement)
2153  // NODEL (optional - tells the system NOT to delete any waypoints)
2154  // this is very handy if you want to do waypoints, that are
2155  // later switched on/off according to special events (like escort
2156  // quests, etc)
2157 
2158  uint32 lowguid;
2159  Creature* pCreature;
2160  if (!ExtractUInt32(&args, lowguid)) // case .setmovetype $move_type (with selected creature)
2161  {
2162  pCreature = getSelectedCreature();
2163  if (!pCreature || !pCreature->HasStaticDBSpawnData())
2164  return false;
2165  lowguid = pCreature->GetGUIDLow();
2166  }
2167  else // case .setmovetype #creature_guid $move_type (with guid)
2168  {
2169  CreatureData const* data = sObjectMgr.GetCreatureData(lowguid);
2170  if (!data)
2171  {
2172  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_CREATGUIDNOTFOUND, lowguid);
2173  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
2174  return false;
2175  }
2176 
2177  Player* player = m_session->GetPlayer();
2178 
2179  if (player->GetMapId() != data->mapid)
2180  {
2181  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_CREATUREATSAMEMAP, lowguid);
2182  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
2183  return false;
2184  }
2185 
2186  pCreature = player->GetMap()->GetCreature(data->GetObjectGuid(lowguid));
2187  }
2188 
2189  MovementGeneratorType move_type;
2190  char* type_str = ExtractLiteralArg(&args);
2191  if (!type_str)
2192  return false;
2193 
2194  if (strncmp(type_str, "stay", strlen(type_str)) == 0)
2195  move_type = IDLE_MOTION_TYPE;
2196  else if (strncmp(type_str, "random", strlen(type_str)) == 0)
2197  move_type = RANDOM_MOTION_TYPE;
2198  else if (strncmp(type_str, "way", strlen(type_str)) == 0)
2199  move_type = WAYPOINT_MOTION_TYPE;
2200  else if (strncmp(type_str, "lin", strlen(type_str)) == 0)
2201  move_type = LINEAR_WP_MOTION_TYPE;
2202  else
2203  return false;
2204 
2205  bool doNotDelete = ExtractLiteralArg(&args, "NODEL") != nullptr;
2206  if (!doNotDelete && *args) // need fail if false in result wrong literal
2207  return false;
2208 
2209  // now lowguid is low guid really existing creature
2210  // and pCreature point (maybe) to this creature or nullptr
2211 
2212  // update movement type
2213  if (!doNotDelete)
2214  sWaypointMgr.DeletePath(lowguid);
2215 
2216  if (pCreature)
2217  {
2218  pCreature->SetDefaultMovementType(move_type);
2219  pCreature->GetMotionMaster()->Initialize();
2220  if (pCreature->IsAlive()) // dead creature will reset movement generator at respawn
2221  {
2222  pCreature->SetDeathState(JUST_DIED);
2223  pCreature->Respawn();
2224  }
2225  pCreature->SaveToDB();
2226  }
2227 
2228  if (doNotDelete)
2229  PSendSysMessage(LANG_MOVE_TYPE_SET_NODEL, type_str);
2230  else
2231  PSendSysMessage(LANG_MOVE_TYPE_SET, type_str);
2232 
2233  return true;
2234 }

2298 // set spawn dist of creature
2299 bool ChatHandler::HandleNpcSpawnDistCommand(char* args)
2300 {
2301  Creature* pCreature = getSelectedCreature();
2302  if (!pCreature)
2303  {
2304  SendSysMessage(LANG_SELECT_CREATURE);
2305  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
2306  return false;
2307  }
2308 
2309  float spawnDist = pCreature->GetRespawnRadius();
2310  PSendSysMessage("Current spawn dist is %4.2f", spawnDist);
2311 
2312  if (!*args)
2313  return true;
2314 
2315  float option;
2316  try
2317  {
2318  option = (float)std::stod(args);
2319  }
2320  catch (const std::invalid_argument&)
2321  {
2322  // string was not a float representation
2323  return false;
2324  }
2325 
2326  if (option < 0.0f)
2327  {
2328  SendSysMessage(LANG_BAD_VALUE);
2329  return false;
2330  }
2331 
2332  MovementGeneratorType mtype = IDLE_MOTION_TYPE;
2333  if (option > 0.0f)
2334  mtype = RANDOM_MOTION_TYPE;
2335 
2336  pCreature->SetRespawnRadius(option);
2337  pCreature->SetDefaultMovementType(mtype);
2338  CreatureData* cData = sObjectMgr.GetCreatureData(pCreature->GetGUIDLow());
2339  if (cData)
2340  {
2341  // as we do not reload it from DB we'll update the creature data here
2342  cData->movementType = uint8(mtype);
2343  cData->spawndist = option;
2344  }
2345 
2346  // respawn alive creature to reinitialize everything including movement generator (dead one will do it anyway at respawn)
2347  if (pCreature->IsAlive())
2348  {
2349  pCreature->SetDeathState(JUST_DIED);
2350  pCreature->Respawn();
2351  }
2352 
2353  WorldDatabase.PExecuteLog("UPDATE creature SET spawndist=%f, MovementType=%i WHERE guid=%u", option, mtype, pCreature->GetGUIDLow());
2354  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_SPAWNDIST, option);
2355  return true;
2356 }

2720 bool ChatHandler::HandleNpcSubNameCommand(char* /*args*/)

2731  }
2732 
2733  for (uint8 i = 0; i < strlen(args); ++i)
2734  {

2736  {

2740  }

2765 // move item to other slot
2766 bool ChatHandler::HandleItemMoveCommand(char* args)
2767 {
2768  if (!*args)
2769  return false;
2770 
2771  char* pParam1 = strtok(args, " ");
2772  if (!pParam1)
2773  return false;
2774 
2775  char* pParam2 = strtok(nullptr, " ");
2776  if (!pParam2)
2777  return false;
2778 
2779  uint8 srcslot = (uint8)atoi(pParam1);
2780  uint8 dstslot = (uint8)atoi(pParam2);
2781 
2782  if (srcslot == dstslot)
2783  return true;
2784 
2785  Player* player = m_session->GetPlayer();
2786  if (!player->IsValidPos(INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_0, srcslot, true))
2787  return false;
2788 
2789  // can be autostore pos
2790  if (!player->IsValidPos(INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_0, dstslot, false))
2791  return false;
2792 
2793  uint16 src = ((INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_0 << 8) | srcslot);
2794  uint16 dst = ((INVENTORY_SLOT_BAG_0 << 8) | dstslot);
2795 
2796  player->SwapItem(src, dst);
2797 
2798  return true;
2799 }

2891 // show info of player
2892 bool ChatHandler::HandlePInfoCommand(char* args)
2893 {
2894  Player* target;
2895  ObjectGuid target_guid;
2896  std::string target_name;
2897  if (!ExtractPlayerTarget(&args, &target, &target_guid, &target_name))
2898  return false;
2899 
2900  uint32 accId;
2901  uint32 money;
2902  uint32 total_player_time;
2903  uint32 level;
2904  uint32 latency = 0;
2905 
2906  // get additional information from Player object
2907  if (target)
2908  {
2909  // check online security
2910  if (HasLowerSecurity(target))
2911  return false;
2912 
2913  accId = target->GetSession()->GetAccountId();
2914  money = target->GetMoney();
2915  total_player_time = target->GetTotalPlayedTime();
2916  level = target->GetLevel();
2917  latency = target->GetSession()->GetLatency();
2918  }
2919  // get additional information from DB
2920  else
2921  {
2922  // check offline security
2923  if (HasLowerSecurity(nullptr, target_guid))
2924  return false;
2925 
2926  // 0 1 2 3
2927  QueryResult* result = CharacterDatabase.PQuery("SELECT totaltime, level, money, account FROM characters WHERE guid = '%u'", target_guid.GetCounter());
2928  if (!result)
2929  return false;
2930 
2931  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
2932  total_player_time = fields[0].GetUInt32();
2933  level = fields[1].GetUInt32();
2934  money = fields[2].GetUInt32();
2935  accId = fields[3].GetUInt32();
2936  delete result;
2937  }
2938 
2939  std::string username = GetMangosString(LANG_ERROR);
2940  std::string last_ip = GetMangosString(LANG_ERROR);
2941  AccountTypes security = SEC_PLAYER;
2942  std::string last_login = GetMangosString(LANG_ERROR);
2943 
2944  QueryResult* result = LoginDatabase.PQuery("SELECT username,gmlevel,ip,loginTime FROM account a JOIN account_logons b ON(a.id=b.accountId) WHERE a.id = '%u' ORDER BY loginTime DESC LIMIT 1", accId);
2945  if (result)
2946  {
2947  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
2948  username = fields[0].GetCppString();
2949  security = (AccountTypes)fields[1].GetUInt32();
2950 
2951  if (GetAccessLevel() >= security)
2952  {
2953  last_ip = fields[2].GetCppString();
2954  last_login = fields[3].GetCppString();
2955  }
2956  else
2957  {
2958  last_ip = "-";
2959  last_login = "-";
2960  }
2961 
2962  delete result;
2963  }
2964 
2965  std::string nameLink = playerLink(target_name);
2966 
2967  PSendSysMessage(LANG_PINFO_ACCOUNT, (target ? "" : GetMangosString(LANG_OFFLINE)), nameLink.c_str(), target_guid.GetCounter(), username.c_str(), accId, uint32(security), last_ip.c_str(), last_login.c_str(), latency);
2968 
2969  std::string timeStr = secsToTimeString(total_player_time, true, true);
2970  uint32 gold = money / GOLD;
2971  uint32 silv = (money % GOLD) / SILVER;
2972  uint32 copp = (money % GOLD) % SILVER;
2973  PSendSysMessage(LANG_PINFO_LEVEL, timeStr.c_str(), level, gold, silv, copp);
2974 
2975  if (target)

2978  return true;
2979 }

3045 bool ChatHandler::HandleWpAddCommand(char* args)
3046 {
3047  DEBUG_LOG("DEBUG: HandleWpAddCommand");
3048 
3049  CreatureInfo const* waypointInfo = ObjectMgr::GetCreatureTemplate(VISUAL_WAYPOINT);
3050  if (!waypointInfo || waypointInfo->GetHighGuid() != HIGHGUID_UNIT)
3051  return false; // must exist as normal creature in mangos.sql 'creature_template'
3052 
3053  Creature* targetCreature = getSelectedCreature();
3054  WaypointPathOrigin wpDestination = PATH_NO_PATH;
3055  uint32 wpPathId = 0;
3056  uint32 wpPointId = 0;
3057  Creature* wpOwner;
3058 
3059  if (targetCreature)
3060  {
3061  // Check if the user did specify a visual waypoint
3062  if (targetCreature->GetEntry() == VISUAL_WAYPOINT && targetCreature->GetSubtype() == CREATURE_SUBTYPE_TEMPORARY_SUMMON)
3063  {
3064  TemporarySpawnWaypoint* wpTarget = dynamic_cast<TemporarySpawnWaypoint*>(targetCreature);
3065  if (!wpTarget)
3066  {
3067  PSendSysMessage(LANG_WAYPOINT_VP_SELECT);
3068  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
3069  return false;
3070  }
3071 
3072  // Who moves along this waypoint?
3073  wpOwner = targetCreature->GetMap()->GetAnyTypeCreature(wpTarget->GetSpawnerGuid());
3074  if (!wpOwner)
3075  {
3076  PSendSysMessage(LANG_WAYPOINT_NOTFOUND_NPC, wpTarget->GetSpawnerGuid().GetString().c_str());
3077  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
3078  return false;
3079  }
3080  wpDestination = (WaypointPathOrigin)wpTarget->GetPathOrigin();
3081  wpPathId = wpTarget->GetPathId();
3082  wpPointId = wpTarget->GetWaypointId() + 1; // Insert as next waypoint
3083  }
3084  else // normal creature selected
3085  wpOwner = targetCreature;
3086  }
3087  else
3088  {
3089  uint32 dbGuid;
3090  if (!ExtractUInt32(&args, dbGuid))
3091  {
3092  PSendSysMessage(LANG_WAYPOINT_NOGUID);
3093  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
3094  return false;
3095  }
3096 
3097  CreatureData const* data = sObjectMgr.GetCreatureData(dbGuid);
3098  if (!data)
3099  {
3100  PSendSysMessage(LANG_WAYPOINT_CREATNOTFOUND, dbGuid);
3101  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
3102  return false;
3103  }
3104 
3105  if (m_session->GetPlayer()->GetMapId() != data->mapid)
3106  {
3107  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_CREATUREATSAMEMAP, dbGuid);
3108  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
3109  return false;
3110  }
3111 
3112  wpOwner = m_session->GetPlayer()->GetMap()->GetAnyTypeCreature(data->GetObjectGuid(dbGuid));
3113  if (!wpOwner)
3114  {
3115  PSendSysMessage(LANG_WAYPOINT_CREATNOTFOUND, dbGuid);
3116  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
3117  return false;
3118  }
3119  }
3120 
3121  if (wpDestination == PATH_NO_PATH) // No Waypoint selected, parse additional params
3122  {
3123  if (ExtractOptUInt32(&args, wpPathId, 0)) // Fill path-id and source
3124  {
3125  uint32 src = (uint32)PATH_NO_PATH;
3126  if (ExtractOptUInt32(&args, src, src))
3127  wpDestination = (WaypointPathOrigin)src;
3128  else // pathId provided but no destination
3129  {
3130  if (wpPathId != 0)
3131  wpDestination = PATH_FROM_ENTRY; // Multiple Paths must only be assigned by entry
3132  }
3133  }
3134 
3135  if (wpDestination == PATH_NO_PATH) // No overwrite params. Do best estimate
3136  {
3137  if (wpOwner->GetMotionMaster()->GetCurrentMovementGeneratorType() == WAYPOINT_MOTION_TYPE)
3138  if (WaypointMovementGenerator<Creature> const* wpMMGen = dynamic_cast<WaypointMovementGenerator<Creature> const*>(wpOwner->GetMotionMaster()->GetCurrent()))
3139  wpMMGen->GetPathInformation(wpPathId, wpDestination);
3140 
3141  // Get information about default path if no current path. If no default path, prepare data dependendy on uniqueness
3142  if (wpDestination == PATH_NO_PATH && !sWaypointMgr.GetDefaultPath(wpOwner->GetEntry(), wpOwner->GetGUIDLow(), &wpDestination))
3143  {
3144  wpDestination = PATH_FROM_ENTRY; // Default place to store paths
3145  if (wpOwner->HasStaticDBSpawnData())
3146  {
3147  QueryResult* result = WorldDatabase.PQuery("SELECT COUNT(id) FROM creature WHERE id = %u", wpOwner->GetEntry());
3148  if (result && result->Fetch()[0].GetUInt32() != 1)
3149  wpDestination = PATH_FROM_GUID;
3150  delete result;
3151  }
3152  }
3153  }
3154  }
3155 
3156  // All arguments parsed
3157  // wpOwner will get a new waypoint inserted into wpPath = GetPathFromOrigin(wpOwner, wpDestination, wpPathId) at wpPointId
3158 
3159  float x, y, z;
3160  m_session->GetPlayer()->GetPosition(x, y, z);
3161  if (!sWaypointMgr.AddNode(wpOwner->GetEntry(), wpOwner->GetGUIDLow(), wpPathId, wpPointId, wpDestination, x, y, z, m_session->GetPlayer()->GetOrientation()))
3162  {
3163  PSendSysMessage(LANG_WAYPOINT_NOTCREATED, wpPointId, wpOwner->GetGuidStr().c_str(), wpPathId, WaypointManager::GetOriginString(wpDestination).c_str());
3164  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
3165  return false;
3166  }
3167 
3168  // Unsummon old visuals, summon new ones
3169  UnsummonVisualWaypoints(m_session->GetPlayer(), wpOwner->GetObjectGuid());
3170  WaypointPath const* wpPath = sWaypointMgr.GetPathFromOrigin(wpOwner->GetEntry(), wpOwner->GetGUIDLow(), wpPathId, wpDestination);
3171  for (const auto& itr : *wpPath)
3172  {
3173  if (!Helper_CreateWaypointFor(wpOwner, wpDestination, wpPathId, itr.first, &itr.second))
3174  {
3175  PSendSysMessage(LANG_WAYPOINT_VP_NOTCREATED, VISUAL_WAYPOINT);
3176  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
3177  return false;
3178  }
3179  }
3180 
3181  PSendSysMessage(LANG_WAYPOINT_ADDED, wpPointId, wpOwner->GetGuidStr().c_str(), wpPathId, WaypointManager::GetOriginString(wpDestination).c_str());
3182 
3183  return true;
3184 } // HandleWpAddCommand

3415  sWaypointMgr.SetNodeOrientation(wpOwner->GetEntry(), wpOwner->GetGUIDLow(), wpId, wpPathId, wpSource, ori);
3416  }
3417 
3418  PSendSysMessage(LANG_WAYPOINT_CHANGED_NO, subCmd_str);
3419  return true;
3420 }

3437 bool ChatHandler::HandleWpShowCommand(char* args)
3438 {

3441  if (!*args)

3474 
3475  if (ExtractOptUInt32(&args, wpPathId, 0)) // Fill path-id and source
3476  {
3477  uint32 src = (uint32)PATH_NO_PATH;
3478  if (ExtractOptUInt32(&args, src, src))
3479  wpOrigin = (WaypointPathOrigin)src;
3480  }

3497  }
3498  }
3499 
3500  Creature* wpOwner = nullptr;
3501  TemporarySpawnWaypoint* wpTarget = nullptr; // Define here for wp-info command
3502 
3503  // Show info for the selected waypoint (Step one: get moving npc)
3504  if (subCmd == "info")
3505  {
3506  // Check if the user did specify a visual waypoint
3507  if (targetCreature->GetEntry() != VISUAL_WAYPOINT || targetCreature->GetSubtype() != CREATURE_SUBTYPE_TEMPORARY_SUMMON)
3508  {

3510  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
3511  return false;

3514  if (!wpTarget)
3515  {
3516  PSendSysMessage(LANG_WAYPOINT_VP_SELECT);
3517  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
3518  return false;
3519  }
3520 
3521  // Who moves along this waypoint?
3522  wpOwner = targetCreature->GetMap()->GetAnyTypeCreature(wpTarget->GetSpawnerGuid());
3523  if (!wpOwner)
3524  {
3525  PSendSysMessage(LANG_WAYPOINT_NOTFOUND_NPC, wpTarget->GetSpawnerGuid().GetString().c_str());
3526  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
3527  return false;
3528  }
3529 
3530  // Ignore params, use information of selected waypoint!
3531  wpOrigin = (WaypointPathOrigin)wpTarget->GetPathOrigin();
3532  wpPathId = wpTarget->GetPathId();
3533  }
3534  else
3535  wpOwner = targetCreature;
3536 
3537  // Get the path
3538  WaypointPath* wpPath = nullptr;
3539  if (wpOrigin != PATH_NO_PATH) // Might have been provided by param
3540  wpPath = sWaypointMgr.GetPathFromOrigin(wpOwner->GetEntry(), wpOwner->GetGUIDLow(), wpPathId, wpOrigin);
3541  else
3542  {
3543  auto mgenType = wpOwner->GetMotionMaster()->GetCurrentMovementGeneratorType();
3544  if (mgenType == WAYPOINT_MOTION_TYPE || mgenType == LINEAR_WP_MOTION_TYPE || mgenType == PATH_MOTION_TYPE)
3545  {

3547  if (targetCreature->GetCreatureGroup() && targetCreature->GetCreatureGroup()->GetFormationEntry())
3548  pathEntry = targetCreature->GetCreatureGroup()->GetFormationEntry()->MovementIdOrWander;
3549  if (WaypointMovementGenerator<Creature> const* wpMMGen = dynamic_cast<WaypointMovementGenerator<Creature> const*>(wpOwner->GetMotionMaster()->GetCurrent()))
3550  {
3551  wpMMGen->GetPathInformation(wpPathId, wpOrigin);
3552  wpPath = sWaypointMgr.GetPathFromOrigin(pathEntry, wpOwner->GetDbGuid(), wpPathId, wpOrigin);
3553  }
3554  }
3555 
3556  if (wpOrigin == PATH_NO_PATH)
3557  wpPath = sWaypointMgr.GetDefaultPath(wpOwner->GetEntry(), wpOwner->GetDbGuid(), &wpOrigin);
3558  }
3559

3561  {

3563  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
3564  return false;
3565  }
3566

3568  if (subCmd == "info")
3569  {
3570  // Find the waypoint
3571  WaypointPath::const_iterator point = wpPath->find(wpTarget->GetWaypointId());
3572  if (point == wpPath->end())
3573  {

3596  {
3597  PSendSysMessage(LANG_WAYPOINT_VP_NOTCREATED, VISUAL_WAYPOINT);
3598  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
3599  return false;
3600  }
3601  }
3602 
3603  return true;
3604  }

3607  {

3611  SetSentErrorMessage(true);

3613  }

3643 bool ChatHandler::HandleWpExportCommand(char* args)
3644 {
3645  if (!*args)
3646  return false;
3647 
3648  Creature* wpOwner;
3649  WaypointPathOrigin wpOrigin = PATH_NO_PATH;
3650  uint32 wpPathId = 0;
3651 
3652  if (Creature* targetCreature = getSelectedCreature())
3653  {
3654  // Check if the user did specify a visual waypoint
3655  if (targetCreature->GetEntry() == VISUAL_WAYPOINT && targetCreature->GetSubtype() == CREATURE_SUBTYPE_TEMPORARY_SUMMON)
3656  {
3657  TemporarySpawnWaypoint* wpTarget = dynamic_cast<TemporarySpawnWaypoint*>(targetCreature);
3658  if (!wpTarget)
3659  {
3660  PSendSysMessage(LANG_WAYPOINT_VP_SELECT);
3661  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
3662  return false;
3663  }
3664 
3665  // Who moves along this waypoint?
3666  wpOwner = targetCreature->GetMap()->GetAnyTypeCreature(wpTarget->GetSpawnerGuid());
3667  if (!wpOwner)
3668  {
3669  PSendSysMessage(LANG_WAYPOINT_NOTFOUND_NPC, wpTarget->GetSpawnerGuid().GetString().c_str());
3670  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
3671  return false;
3672  }
3673  wpOrigin = (WaypointPathOrigin)wpTarget->GetPathOrigin();
3674  wpPathId = wpTarget->GetPathId();
3675  }
3676  else // normal creature selected
3677  wpOwner = targetCreature;
3678  }
3679  else
3680  {
3681  uint32 dbGuid;
3682  if (!ExtractUInt32(&args, dbGuid))
3683  {
3684  PSendSysMessage(LANG_WAYPOINT_NOGUID);
3685  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
3686  return false;
3687  }
3688 
3689  CreatureData const* data = sObjectMgr.GetCreatureData(dbGuid);
3690  if (!data)
3691  {
3692  PSendSysMessage(LANG_WAYPOINT_CREATNOTFOUND, dbGuid);
3693  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
3694  return false;
3695  }
3696 
3697  if (m_session->GetPlayer()->GetMapId() != data->mapid)
3698  {
3699  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_CREATUREATSAMEMAP, dbGuid);
3700  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
3701  return false;
3702  }
3703 
3704  wpOwner = m_session->GetPlayer()->GetMap()->GetAnyTypeCreature(data->GetObjectGuid(dbGuid));
3705  if (!wpOwner)
3706  {
3707  PSendSysMessage(LANG_WAYPOINT_CREATNOTFOUND, dbGuid);
3708  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
3709  return false;
3710  }
3711  }
3712 
3713  // wpOwner is now known, in case of export by visual waypoint also the to be exported path
3714  char* export_str = ExtractLiteralArg(&args);
3715  if (!export_str)
3716  {
3717  PSendSysMessage(LANG_WAYPOINT_ARGUMENTREQ, "export");
3718  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
3719  return false;
3720  }
3721 
3722  if (wpOrigin == PATH_NO_PATH) // No WP selected, Extract optional arguments
3723  {
3724  if (ExtractOptUInt32(&args, wpPathId, 0)) // Fill path-id and source
3725  {
3726  uint32 src = (uint32)PATH_NO_PATH;
3727  if (ExtractOptUInt32(&args, src, src))
3728  wpOrigin = (WaypointPathOrigin)src;
3729  else // pathId provided but no destination
3730  {
3731  if (wpPathId != 0)
3732  wpOrigin = PATH_FROM_ENTRY; // Multiple Paths must only be assigned by entry
3733  }
3734  }
3735 
3736  if (wpOrigin == PATH_NO_PATH)
3737  {
3738  if (wpOwner->GetMotionMaster()->GetCurrentMovementGeneratorType() == WAYPOINT_MOTION_TYPE)
3739  if (WaypointMovementGenerator<Creature> const* wpMMGen = dynamic_cast<WaypointMovementGenerator<Creature> const*>(wpOwner->GetMotionMaster()->GetCurrent()))
3740  wpMMGen->GetPathInformation(wpPathId, wpOrigin);
3741  if (wpOrigin == PATH_NO_PATH)
3742  sWaypointMgr.GetDefaultPath(wpOwner->GetEntry(), wpOwner->GetGUIDLow(), &wpOrigin);
3743  }
3744  }
3745 
3746  WaypointPath const* wpPath = sWaypointMgr.GetPathFromOrigin(wpOwner->GetEntry(), wpOwner->GetGUIDLow(), wpPathId, wpOrigin);
3747  if (!wpPath || wpPath->empty())
3748  {
3749  PSendSysMessage(LANG_WAYPOINT_NOTHINGTOEXPORT);
3750  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
3751  return false;
3752  }
3753 
3754  std::ofstream outfile;
3755  outfile.open(export_str);
3756 
3757  std::string table;
3758  char const* key_field;
3759  uint32 key;
3760  switch (wpOrigin)
3761  {
3762  case PATH_FROM_ENTRY: key = wpOwner->GetEntry(); key_field = "Entry"; table = "creature_movement_template"; break;
3763  case PATH_FROM_GUID: key = wpOwner->GetGUIDLow(); key_field = "Id"; table = "creature_movement"; break;
3764  case PATH_FROM_EXTERNAL: key = wpOwner->GetEntry(); key_field = "Entry"; table = sWaypointMgr.GetExternalWPTable(); break;
3765  case PATH_FROM_WAYPOINT_PATH: key = wpOwner->GetMotionMaster()->GetPathId(); key_field = "PathId"; table = "waypoint_path"; break;
3766  default:
3767  return false;
3768  }
3769 
3770  outfile << "DELETE FROM " << table << " WHERE " << key_field << "=" << key << ";\n";
3771  if (wpOrigin != PATH_FROM_EXTERNAL)
3772  outfile << "INSERT INTO " << table << " (" << key_field << ", Point, PositionX, PositionY, PositionZ, Orientation, WaitTime, ScriptId) VALUES\n";
3773  else
3774  outfile << "INSERT INTO " << table << " (" << key_field << ", Point, PositionX, PositionY, positionZ, Orientation, WaitTime) VALUES\n";
3775 
3776  WaypointPath::const_iterator itr = wpPath->begin();
3777  uint32 countDown = wpPath->size();
3778  for (; itr != wpPath->end(); ++itr, --countDown)
3779  {
3780  outfile << "(" << key << ",";
3781  outfile << itr->first << ",";
3782  outfile << itr->second.x << ",";
3783  outfile << itr->second.y << ",";
3784  outfile << itr->second.z << ",";
3785  outfile << itr->second.orientation << ",";
3786  outfile << itr->second.delay << ",";
3787  if (wpOrigin != PATH_FROM_EXTERNAL) // Only for normal waypoints
3788  outfile << itr->second.script_id << ")";
3789  if (countDown > 1)
3790  outfile << ",\n";
3791  else
3792  outfile << ";\n";
3793  }
3794 
3795  PSendSysMessage(LANG_WAYPOINT_EXPORTED);
3796  outfile.close();
3797 
3798  return true;
3799 }

3952 bool ChatHandler::HandleLookupEventCommand(char* args)
3953 {
3954  if (!*args)
3955  return false;
3956 
3957  std::string namepart = args;
3958  std::wstring wnamepart;
3959 
3960  // converting string that we try to find to lower case
3961  if (!Utf8toWStr(namepart, wnamepart))
3962  return false;
3963 
3964  wstrToLower(wnamepart);
3965 
3966  uint32 counter = 0;
3967 
3968  GameEventMgr::GameEventDataMap const& events = sGameEventMgr.GetEventMap();
3969 
3970  for (uint32 id = 1; id < events.size(); ++id)
3971  {
3972  if (!sGameEventMgr.IsValidEvent(id))
3973  continue;
3974 
3975  GameEventData const& eventData = events[id];
3976 
3977  std::string descr = eventData.description;
3978  if (descr.empty())
3979  continue;
3980 
3981  if (Utf8FitTo(descr, wnamepart))
3982  {
3983  char const* active = sGameEventMgr.IsActiveEvent(id) ? GetMangosString(LANG_ACTIVE) : "";
3984 
3985  if (m_session)
3986  PSendSysMessage(LANG_EVENT_ENTRY_LIST_CHAT, id, id, eventData.description.c_str(), active);
3987  else
3988  PSendSysMessage(LANG_EVENT_ENTRY_LIST_CONSOLE, id, eventData.description.c_str(), active);
3989 
3990  ++counter;
3991  }
3992  }
3993 
3994  if (counter == 0)
3995  SendSysMessage(LANG_NOEVENTFOUND);
3996 
3997  return true;
3998 }

4000 bool ChatHandler::HandleEventListCommand(char* args)
4001 {
4002  uint32 counter = 0;
4003  bool all = false;
4004  std::string arg = args;
4005  if (arg == "all")
4006  all = true;
4007 
4008  GameEventMgr::GameEventDataMap const& events = sGameEventMgr.GetEventMap();
4009 
4010  char const* active = GetMangosString(LANG_ACTIVE);
4011  char const* inactive = GetMangosString(LANG_FACTION_INACTIVE);
4012 
4013  for (uint32 event_id = 0; event_id < events.size(); ++event_id)
4014  {
4015  if (!sGameEventMgr.IsValidEvent(event_id))
4016  continue;
4017 
4018  char const* state;
4019  if (!sGameEventMgr.IsActiveEvent(event_id))
4020  {
4021  if (!all)
4022  continue;
4023  state = inactive;
4024  }
4025  else
4026  state = active;
4027 
4028  GameEventData const& eventData = events[event_id];
4029 
4030  if (m_session)
4031  PSendSysMessage(LANG_EVENT_ENTRY_LIST_CHAT, event_id, event_id, eventData.description.c_str(), state);
4032  else
4033  PSendSysMessage(LANG_EVENT_ENTRY_LIST_CONSOLE, event_id, eventData.description.c_str(), state);
4034 
4035  ++counter;
4036  }
4037 
4038  if (counter == 0)
4039  SendSysMessage(LANG_NOEVENTFOUND);
4040 
4041  return true;
4042 }

4044 bool ChatHandler::HandleEventInfoCommand(char* args)
4045 {
4046  if (!*args)
4047  return false;
4048 
4049  // id or [name] Shift-click form |color|Hgameevent:id|h[name]|h|r
4050  uint32 event_id;
4051  if (!ExtractUint32KeyFromLink(&args, "Hgameevent", event_id))
4052  return false;

4054  GameEventMgr::GameEventDataMap const& events = sGameEventMgr.GetEventMap();
4055 
4056  if (!sGameEventMgr.IsValidEvent(event_id))
4057  {
4058  SendSysMessage(LANG_EVENT_NOT_EXIST);
4059  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
4060  return false;
4061  }
4062 
4063  GameEventData const& eventData = events[event_id];
4064 
4065  char const* activeStr = sGameEventMgr.IsActiveEvent(event_id) ? GetMangosString(LANG_ACTIVE) : "";
4066 
4067  std::string startTimeStr = TimeToTimestampStr(eventData.start);
4068  std::string endTimeStr = TimeToTimestampStr(eventData.end);
4069 
4070  uint32 delay = sGameEventMgr.NextCheck(event_id);
4071  time_t nextTime = time(nullptr) + delay;
4072  std::string nextStr = nextTime >= eventData.start && nextTime < eventData.end ? TimeToTimestampStr(time(nullptr) + delay) : "-";
4073 
4074  std::string occurenceStr = secsToTimeString(eventData.occurence * MINUTE);
4075  std::string lengthStr = secsToTimeString(eventData.length * MINUTE);
4076 
4077  PSendSysMessage(LANG_EVENT_INFO, event_id, eventData.description.c_str(), activeStr,
4078  startTimeStr.c_str(), endTimeStr.c_str(), occurenceStr.c_str(), lengthStr.c_str(),
4079  nextStr.c_str());
4080  return true;
4081 }

4195 void ChatHandler::HandleLearnSkillRecipesHelper(Player* player, uint32 skill_id)
4196 {
4197  uint32 classmask = player->getClassMask();
4198 
4199  for (uint32 j = 0; j < sSkillLineAbilityStore.GetNumRows(); ++j)
4200  {
4201  SkillLineAbilityEntry const* skillLine = sSkillLineAbilityStore.LookupEntry(j);
4202  if (!skillLine)
4203  continue;
4204 
4205  // wrong skill
4206  if (skillLine->skillId != skill_id)
4207  continue;
4208 
4209  // not high rank
4210  if (skillLine->forward_spellid)
4211  continue;
4212 
4213  // skip racial skills
4214  if (skillLine->racemask != 0)
4215  continue;
4216 
4217  // skip wrong class skills
4218  if (skillLine->classmask && (skillLine->classmask & classmask) == 0)
4219  continue;
4220 
4221  SpellEntry const* spellInfo = sSpellTemplate.LookupEntry<SpellEntry>(skillLine->spellId);
4222  if (!spellInfo || !SpellMgr::IsSpellValid(spellInfo, player, false))
4223  continue;
4224 
4225  player->learnSpell(skillLine->spellId, false);
4226  }
4227 }

4229 bool ChatHandler::HandleLearnAllCraftsCommand(char* /*args*/)
4230 {
4231  for (uint32 i = 0; i < sSkillLineStore.GetNumRows(); ++i)
4232  {
4233  SkillLineEntry const* skillInfo = sSkillLineStore.LookupEntry(i);
4234  if (!skillInfo)
4235  continue;
4236 
4237  if ((skillInfo->categoryId == SKILL_CATEGORY_PROFESSION || skillInfo->categoryId == SKILL_CATEGORY_SECONDARY) &&
4238  skillInfo->canLink) // only prof. with recipes have
4239  {
4240  HandleLearnSkillRecipesHelper(m_session->GetPlayer(), skillInfo->id);
4241  }
4242  }
4243 
4244  SendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_LEARN_ALL_CRAFT);
4245  return true;
4246 }

4248 bool ChatHandler::HandleLearnAllRecipesCommand(char* args)
4249 {
4250  // Learns all recipes of specified profession and sets skill to max
4251  // Example: .learn all_recipes enchanting
4252 
4253  Player* target = getSelectedPlayer();
4254  if (!target)
4255  {
4256  SendSysMessage(LANG_PLAYER_NOT_FOUND);
4257  return false;
4258  }
4259 
4260  if (!*args)
4261  return false;
4262 
4263  std::wstring wnamepart;
4264 
4265  if (!Utf8toWStr(args, wnamepart))
4266  return false;
4267 
4268  // converting string that we try to find to lower case
4269  wstrToLower(wnamepart);
4270 
4271  std::string name;
4272 
4273  SkillLineEntry const* targetSkillInfo = nullptr;
4274  for (uint32 i = 1; i < sSkillLineStore.GetNumRows(); ++i)
4275  {
4276  SkillLineEntry const* skillInfo = sSkillLineStore.LookupEntry(i);
4277  if (!skillInfo)
4278  continue;
4279 
4280  if ((skillInfo->categoryId != SKILL_CATEGORY_PROFESSION &&
4281  skillInfo->categoryId != SKILL_CATEGORY_SECONDARY) ||
4282  !skillInfo->canLink) // only prof with recipes have set
4283  continue;
4284 
4285  int loc = GetSessionDbcLocale();
4286  name = skillInfo->name[loc];
4287  if (name.empty())
4288  continue;
4289 
4290  if (!Utf8FitTo(name, wnamepart))
4291  {
4292  loc = 0;
4293  for (; loc < MAX_LOCALE; ++loc)
4294  {
4295  if (loc == GetSessionDbcLocale())
4296  continue;
4297 
4298  name = skillInfo->name[loc];
4299  if (name.empty())
4300  continue;
4301 
4302  if (Utf8FitTo(name, wnamepart))
4303  break;
4304  }
4305  }
4306 
4307  if (loc < MAX_LOCALE)
4308  {
4309  targetSkillInfo = skillInfo;
4310  break;
4311  }
4312  }
4313 
4314  if (!targetSkillInfo)
4315  return false;
4316 
4317  HandleLearnSkillRecipesHelper(target, targetSkillInfo->id);
4318 
4319  uint16 maxLevel = target->GetSkillMaxPure(targetSkillInfo->id);
4320  target->SetSkill(targetSkillInfo->id, maxLevel, maxLevel);
4321  PSendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_LEARN_ALL_RECIPES, name.c_str());
4322  return true;
4323 }

4383 bool ChatHandler::ShowAccountListHelper(QueryResult* result, uint32* limit, bool title, bool error)
4384 {

4386  {
