4388  SendSysMessage(LANG_ACCOUNT_LIST_EMPTY);
4389  return true;
4390  }
4391 
4393  if (!m_session && title) // not output header for online case
4394  {
4395  SendSysMessage(LANG_ACCOUNT_LIST_BAR);
4396  SendSysMessage(LANG_ACCOUNT_LIST_HEADER);
4397  SendSysMessage(LANG_ACCOUNT_LIST_BAR);
4398  }
4399 
4401  do
4402  {
4403  // check limit
4404  if (limit)
4405  {
4406  if (*limit == 0)
4407  break;
4408  --*limit;
4409  }
4410 
4411  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
4412  uint32 account = fields[0].GetUInt32();
4413 
4414  WorldSession* session = sWorld.FindSession(account);
4415  Player* player = session ? session->GetPlayer() : nullptr;
4416  char const* char_name = player ? player->GetName() : " - ";
4417 
4418  if (m_session)
4419  PSendSysMessage(LANG_ACCOUNT_LIST_LINE_CHAT,
4420  account, fields[1].GetString(), char_name, fields[2].GetString(), fields[3].GetUInt32(), fields[4].GetUInt32());
4421  else
4422  PSendSysMessage(LANG_ACCOUNT_LIST_LINE_CONSOLE,
4423  account, fields[1].GetString(), char_name, fields[2].GetString(), fields[3].GetUInt32(), fields[4].GetUInt32());
4424  }
4425  while (result->NextRow());
4426 
4427  delete result;
4428 
4429  if (!m_session) // not output header for online case
4430  SendSysMessage(LANG_ACCOUNT_LIST_BAR);
4431 
4432  return true;
4433 }

4492 bool ChatHandler::LookupPlayerSearchCommand(QueryResult* result, uint32* limit)
4493 {
4494  if (!result)
4495  {
4496  PSendSysMessage(LANG_NO_PLAYERS_FOUND);
4497  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
4498  return false;
4499  }
4500 
4501  uint32 limit_original = limit ? *limit : 100;
4502 
4503  uint32 limit_local = limit_original;
4504 
4505  if (!limit)
4506  limit = &limit_local;
4507 
4508  do
4509  {
4510  if (limit && *limit == 0)
4511  break;
4512 
4513  Field* fields = result->Fetch();
4514  uint32 acc_id = fields[0].GetUInt32();
4515  std::string acc_name = fields[1].GetCppString();
4516 
4518  QueryResult* chars = CharacterDatabase.PQuery("SELECT guid, name, race, class, level FROM characters WHERE account = %u", acc_id);
4519  if (chars)
4520  {
4521  if (chars->GetRowCount())
4522  {
4523  PSendSysMessage(LANG_LOOKUP_PLAYER_ACCOUNT, acc_name.c_str(), acc_id);
4524  ShowPlayerListHelper(chars, limit, true, false);
4525  }
4526  else
4527  delete chars;
4528  }
4529  }
4530  while (result->NextRow());
4531 
4532  delete result;
4533 
4534  if (*limit == limit_original) // empty accounts only
4535  {
4536  PSendSysMessage(LANG_NO_PLAYERS_FOUND);
4537  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
4538  return false;
4539  }
4540 
4541  return true;
4542 }

4557 bool ChatHandler::HandleLookupPoolCommand(char* args)
4558 {
4559  if (!*args)
4560  return false;
4561 
4562  std::string namepart = args;
4563  strToLower(namepart);
4564

4566 
4567  // spawn pools for expected map or for not initialized shared pools state for non-instanceable maps
4568  for (uint16 pool_id = 0; pool_id < sPoolMgr.GetMaxPoolId(); ++pool_id)
4569  {

4573  strToLower(desc);
4574 
4575  if (desc.find(namepart) == std::wstring::npos)
4576  continue;
4577 
4578  ShowPoolListHelper(pool_id);
4579  ++counter;
4580  }
4581 
4582  if (counter == 0)
4583  SendSysMessage(LANG_NO_POOL);
4584 
4585  return true;
4586 }

4655 bool ChatHandler::HandlePoolInfoCommand(char* args)
4656 {
4657  // id or [name] Shift-click form |color|Hpool:id|h[name]|h|r
4658  uint32 pool_id;
4659  if (!ExtractUint32KeyFromLink(&args, "Hpool", pool_id))
4660  return false;
4661 
4662  if (pool_id > sPoolMgr.GetMaxPoolId())
4663  {
4664  PSendSysMessage(LANG_POOL_ENTRY_LOWER_MAX_POOL, pool_id, sPoolMgr.GetMaxPoolId());
4665  return true;
4666  }
4667 
4668  Player* player = m_session ? m_session->GetPlayer() : nullptr;
4669 
4670  MapPersistentState* mapState = player ? player->GetMap()->GetPersistentState() : nullptr;
4671  SpawnedPoolData const* spawns = mapState ? &mapState->GetSpawnedPoolData() : nullptr;
4672 
4673  std::string active_str = GetMangosString(LANG_ACTIVE);
4674 
4675  PoolTemplateData const& pool_template = sPoolMgr.GetPoolTemplate(pool_id);
4676  uint32 mother_pool_id = sPoolMgr.IsPartOfAPool<Pool>(pool_id);
4677  if (!mother_pool_id)
4678  PSendSysMessage(LANG_POOL_INFO_HEADER, pool_id, pool_template.AutoSpawn, pool_template.MaxLimit);
4679  else

4891 bool ChatHandler::HandleLookupTitleCommand(char* args)
4892 {
4893  if (!*args)
4894  return false;
4895 
4896  // can be nullptr in console call
4897  Player* target = getSelectedPlayer();
4898 
4899  // title name have single string arg for player name
4900  char const* targetName = target ? target->GetName() : "NAME";
4901 
4902  std::string namepart = args;
4903  std::wstring wnamepart;
4904 
4905  if (!Utf8toWStr(namepart, wnamepart))
4906  return false;
4907 
4908  // converting string that we try to find to lower case
4909  wstrToLower(wnamepart);
4910 
4911  uint32 counter = 0; // Counter for figure out that we found smth.
4912 
4913  // Search in CharTitles.dbc
4914  for (uint32 id = 0; id < sCharTitlesStore.GetNumRows(); ++id)
4915  {
4916  CharTitlesEntry const* titleInfo = sCharTitlesStore.LookupEntry(id);
4917  if (titleInfo)
4918  {
4919  int loc = GetSessionDbcLocale();
4920  std::string name = titleInfo->name[loc];
4921  if (name.empty())
4922  continue;
4923 
4924  if (!Utf8FitTo(name, wnamepart))
4925  {
4926  loc = 0;
4927  for (; loc < MAX_LOCALE; ++loc)
4928  {
4929  if (loc == GetSessionDbcLocale())
4930  continue;
4931 
4932  name = titleInfo->name[loc];
4933  if (name.empty())
4934  continue;
4935 
4936  if (Utf8FitTo(name, wnamepart))
4937  break;
4938  }
4939  }
4940 
4941  if (loc < MAX_LOCALE)
4942  {
4943  char const* knownStr = target && target->HasTitle(titleInfo) ? GetMangosString(LANG_KNOWN) : "";
4944 
4945  char const* activeStr = target && target->GetUInt32Value(PLAYER_CHOSEN_TITLE) == titleInfo->bit_index
4946  ? GetMangosString(LANG_ACTIVE)
4947  : "";
4948 
4949  char titleNameStr[80];
4950  snprintf(titleNameStr, 80, name.c_str(), targetName);
4951 
4952  // send title in "id (idx:idx) - [namedlink locale]" format
4953  if (m_session)
4954  PSendSysMessage(LANG_TITLE_LIST_CHAT, id, titleInfo->bit_index, id, titleNameStr, localeNames[loc], knownStr, activeStr);
4955  else
4956  PSendSysMessage(LANG_TITLE_LIST_CONSOLE, id, titleInfo->bit_index, titleNameStr, localeNames[loc], knownStr, activeStr);
4957 
4958  ++counter;
4959  }
4960  }
4961  }
4962  if (counter == 0) // if counter == 0 then we found nth
4963  SendSysMessage(LANG_COMMAND_NOTITLEFOUND);
4964  return true;
4965 }

5066 // Edit Player KnownTitles
5067 bool ChatHandler::HandleTitlesSetMaskCommand(char* args)
5068 {
5069  if (!*args)
5070  return false;
5071 
5072  uint64 titles = 0;
5073 
5074  sscanf(args, UI64FMTD, &titles);
5075 
5076  Player* target = getSelectedPlayer();
5077  if (!target)
5078  {
5079  SendSysMessage(LANG_NO_CHAR_SELECTED);
5080  SetSentErrorMessage(true);
5081  return false;
5082  }
5083 
5084  // check online security
5085  if (HasLowerSecurity(target))
5086  return false;
5087 
5088  uint64 titles2 = titles;
5089 
5090  for (uint32 i = 1; i < sCharTitlesStore.GetNumRows(); ++i)
5091  if (CharTitlesEntry const* tEntry = sCharTitlesStore.LookupEntry(i))
5092  titles2 &= ~(uint64(1) << tEntry->bit_index);
5093 
5094  titles &= ~titles2; // remove nonexistent titles
5095 
5096  target->SetUInt64Value(PLAYER__FIELD_KNOWN_TITLES, titles);
5097  SendSysMessage(LANG_DONE);
5098 
5099  if (!target->HasTitle(target->GetInt32Value(PLAYER_CHOSEN_TITLE)))
5100  {
5101  target->SetUInt32Value(PLAYER_CHOSEN_TITLE, 0);
5102  PSendSysMessage(LANG_CURRENT_TITLE_RESET, GetNameLink(target).c_str());
5103  }
5104 
5105  return true;
5106 }

5108 bool ChatHandler::HandleTitlesSwapCommand(char* /*args*/)
5109 {
5110  Player* target = getSelectedPlayer();
5111  if (!target)
5112  return false;
5113 
5114  uint32 foundTitle = 0;
5115  for (uint32 i = 1; i <= 28; ++i)
5116  {
5117  if (target->HasTitle(i))
5118  {
5119  foundTitle = i;
5120  break;
5121  }
5122  }
5123 
5124  if (!foundTitle)
5125  return false;
5126 
5127  if (CharTitlesEntry const* tEntry = sCharTitlesStore.LookupEntry(foundTitle))
5128  target->SetTitle(tEntry, true);
5129  if (foundTitle > 14)
5130  foundTitle -= 14;
5131  else
5132  foundTitle += 14;
5133  if (CharTitlesEntry const* tEntry = sCharTitlesStore.LookupEntry(foundTitle))
5134  target->SetTitle(tEntry, false);
5135 
5136  return true;
5137 }

5220 bool ChatHandler::HandleMmapPathCommand(char* args)
5221 {
5222  Player* player = m_session->GetPlayer();
5223  if (GenericTransport* transport = player->GetTransport())
5224  {
5225  if (!MMAP::MMapFactory::createOrGetMMapManager()->GetGONavMesh(transport->GetDisplayId()))
5226  {
5227  PSendSysMessage("NavMesh not loaded for current map.");
5228  return true;
5229  }
5230  }
5231  else
5232  {
5233  if (!MMAP::MMapFactory::createOrGetMMapManager()->GetNavMesh(m_session->GetPlayer()->GetMapId(), m_session->GetPlayer()->GetInstanceId()))
5234  {
5235  PSendSysMessage("NavMesh not loaded for current map.");
5236  return true;
5237  }
5238  }
5239 
5240  PSendSysMessage("mmap path:");
5241 
5242  // units
5243  Unit* target = getSelectedUnit();
5244  if (!player || !target)
5245  {
5246  PSendSysMessage("Invalid target/source selection.");
5247  return true;
5248  }
5249 
5250  char* para = strtok(args, " ");
5251 
5252  bool useStraightPath = false;
5253  bool followPath = false;
5254  bool unitToPlayer = false;
5255  if (para)
5256  {
5257  if (strcmp(para, "go") == 0)
5258  {
5259  followPath = true;
5260  para = strtok(nullptr, " ");
5261  if (para && strcmp(para, "straight") == 0)
5262  useStraightPath = true;
5263  }
5264  else if (strcmp(para, "straight") == 0)
5265  useStraightPath = true;
5266  else if (strcmp(para, "to_me") == 0)
5267  unitToPlayer = true;
5268  else
5269  {
5270  PSendSysMessage("Use '.mmap path go' to move on target.");
5271  PSendSysMessage("Use '.mmap path straight' to generate straight path.");
5272  PSendSysMessage("Use '.mmap path to_me' to generate path from the target to you.");
5273  }
5274  }
5275 
5276  Unit* destinationUnit;
5277  Unit* originUnit;
5278  if (unitToPlayer)
5279  {
5280  destinationUnit = player;
5281  originUnit = target;
5282  }
5283  else
5284  {
5285  destinationUnit = target;
5286  originUnit = player;
5287  }
5288 
5289  // unit locations
5290  float x, y, z;
5291  destinationUnit->GetPosition(x, y, z);
5292 
5293  // path
5294  PathFinder path(originUnit);
5295  path.setUseStrightPath(useStraightPath);
5296  path.calculate(x, y, z);
5297 
5298  PointsArray pointPath = path.getPath();
5299  PSendSysMessage("%s's path to %s:", originUnit->GetName(), destinationUnit->GetName());
5300  PSendSysMessage("Building %s", useStraightPath ? "StraightPath" : "SmoothPath");
5301  PSendSysMessage("length " SIZEFMTD " type %u", pointPath.size(), path.getPathType());
5302 
5303  Vector3 start = path.getStartPosition();
5304  Vector3 end = path.getEndPosition();
5305  Vector3 actualEnd = path.getActualEndPosition();
5306 
5307  PSendSysMessage("start (%.3f, %.3f, %.3f)", start.x, start.y, start.z);
5308  PSendSysMessage("end (%.3f, %.3f, %.3f)", end.x, end.y, end.z);
5309  PSendSysMessage("actual end (%.3f, %.3f, %.3f)", actualEnd.x, actualEnd.y, actualEnd.z);
5310 
5311  if (!player->IsGameMaster())
5312  PSendSysMessage("Enable GM mode to see the path points.");
5313 
5314  for (auto& i : pointPath)
5315  player->SummonCreature(VISUAL_WAYPOINT, i.x, i.y, i.z, 0, TEMPSPAWN_TIMED_DESPAWN, 9000);
5316 
5317  if (followPath)
5318  {
5319  Movement::MoveSplineInit init(*player);
5320  init.MovebyPath(pointPath);
5321  init.SetWalk(false);
5322  init.Launch();
5323  }
5324 
5325  return true;
5326 }
5327 
5328 bool ChatHandler::HandleMmapLocCommand(char* /*args*/)
5329 {
5330  PSendSysMessage("mmap tileloc:");
5331 
5332  // grid tile location
5333  Player* player = m_session->GetPlayer();
5334 
5335  int32 gx = 32 - player->GetPositionY() / SIZE_OF_GRIDS; // flipped X and Y for visual correctness
5336  int32 gy = 32 - player->GetPositionX() / SIZE_OF_GRIDS;
5337 
5338  PSendSysMessage("%03u%02i%02i.mmtile", player->GetMapId(), gy, gx);
5339  PSendSysMessage("gridloc [%i,%i]", gy, gx);
5340 
5341  // calculate navmesh tile location
5342  const dtNavMesh* navmesh = MMAP::MMapFactory::createOrGetMMapManager()->GetNavMesh(player->GetMapId(), player->GetInstanceId());
5343  const dtNavMeshQuery* navmeshquery = MMAP::MMapFactory::createOrGetMMapManager()->GetNavMeshQuery(player->GetMapId(), player->GetInstanceId());
5344  if (!navmesh || !navmeshquery)
5345  {
5346  PSendSysMessage("NavMesh not loaded for current map.");
5347  return true;
5348  }
5349 
5350  const float* min = navmesh->getParams()->orig;
5351 
5352  float x, y, z;
5353  player->GetPosition(x, y, z);
5354  float location[VERTEX_SIZE] = {y, z, x};
5355  float extents[VERTEX_SIZE] = {3.0f, 5.0f, 3.0f};
5356 
5357  int32 tilex = int32((y - min[0]) / SIZE_OF_GRIDS);
5358  int32 tiley = int32((x - min[2]) / SIZE_OF_GRIDS);
5359 
5360  PSendSysMessage("Calc [%02i,%02i]", tilex, tiley);
5361 
5362  // navmesh poly -> navmesh tile location
5363  dtQueryFilter filter = dtQueryFilter();
5364  dtPolyRef polyRef = INVALID_POLYREF;
5365  navmeshquery->findNearestPoly(location, extents, &filter, &polyRef, nullptr);
5366 
5367  if (polyRef == INVALID_POLYREF)
5368  PSendSysMessage("Dt [??,??] (invalid poly, probably no tile loaded)");
5369  else
5370  {
5371  const dtMeshTile* tile;
5372  const dtPoly* poly;
5373  dtStatus dtResult = navmesh->getTileAndPolyByRef(polyRef, &tile, &poly);
5374  if ((dtStatusSucceed(dtResult)) && tile)
5375  PSendSysMessage("Dt [%02i,%02i]", tile->header->x, tile->header->y);
5376  else
5377  PSendSysMessage("Dt [??,??] (no tile loaded)");
5378  }
5379 
5380  return true;
5381 }
5382 
5383 bool ChatHandler::HandleMmapLoadedTilesCommand(char* /*args*/)
5384 {
5385  uint32 mapId = m_session->GetPlayer()->GetMapId();
5386  uint32 instanceId = m_session->GetPlayer()->GetInstanceId();
5387 
5388  const dtNavMesh* navmesh = MMAP::MMapFactory::createOrGetMMapManager()->GetNavMesh(mapId, instanceId);
5389  const dtNavMeshQuery* navmeshquery = MMAP::MMapFactory::createOrGetMMapManager()->GetNavMeshQuery(mapId, m_session->GetPlayer()->GetInstanceId());
5390  if (!navmesh || !navmeshquery)
5391  {
5392  PSendSysMessage("NavMesh not loaded for current map.");
5393  return true;
5394  }
5395 
5396  PSendSysMessage("mmap loadedtiles:");
5397 
5398  for (int32 i = 0; i < navmesh->getMaxTiles(); ++i)
5399  {
5400  const dtMeshTile* tile = navmesh->getTile(i);
5401  if (!tile || !tile->header)
5402  continue;
5403 
5404  PSendSysMessage("[%02i,%02i]", tile->header->x, tile->header->y);
5405  }
5406 
5407  return true;
5408 }

5410 bool ChatHandler::HandleMmapStatsCommand(char* /*args*/)
5411 {
5412  PSendSysMessage("mmap stats:");
5413  PSendSysMessage(" global mmap pathfinding is %sabled", sWorld.getConfig(CONFIG_BOOL_MMAP_ENABLED) ? "en" : "dis");
5414 
5415  MMAP::MMapManager* manager = MMAP::MMapFactory::createOrGetMMapManager();
5416  PSendSysMessage(" %u maps loaded with %u tiles overall", manager->getLoadedMapsCount(), manager->getLoadedTilesCount());
5417 
5418  const dtNavMesh* navmesh = manager->GetNavMesh(m_session->GetPlayer()->GetMapId(), m_session->GetPlayer()->GetInstanceId());
5419  if (!navmesh)
5420  {
5421  PSendSysMessage("NavMesh not loaded for current map.");
5422  return true;
5423  }
5424 
5425  uint32 tileCount = 0;
5426  uint32 nodeCount = 0;
5427  uint32 polyCount = 0;
5428  uint32 vertCount = 0;
5429  uint32 triCount = 0;
5430  uint32 triVertCount = 0;
5431  uint32 dataSize = 0;
5432  for (int32 i = 0; i < navmesh->getMaxTiles(); ++i)
5433  {
5434  const dtMeshTile* tile = navmesh->getTile(i);
5435  if (!tile || !tile->header)
5436  continue;
5437 
5438  tileCount ++;
5439  nodeCount += tile->header->bvNodeCount;
5440  polyCount += tile->header->polyCount;
5441  vertCount += tile->header->vertCount;
5442  triCount += tile->header->detailTriCount;
5443  triVertCount += tile->header->detailVertCount;
5444  dataSize += tile->dataSize;
5445  }
5446 
5447  PSendSysMessage("Navmesh stats on current map:");
5448  PSendSysMessage(" %u tiles loaded", tileCount);
5449  PSendSysMessage(" %u BVTree nodes", nodeCount);
5450  PSendSysMessage(" %u polygons (%u vertices)", polyCount, vertCount);
5451  PSendSysMessage(" %u triangles (%u vertices)", triCount, triVertCount);
5452  PSendSysMessage(" %.2f MB of data (not including pointers)", ((float)dataSize / sizeof(unsigned char)) / 1048576);
5453 
5454  return true;
5455 }
